Walaalinyetiis jeenteti iche usu irummeysanne iꞌdaas itidah.
Maantaka Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Ibeenki an irdi uliba a ankhanyahe. Atin la a geeddi atin ibeenki atin ꞌdoontaan on irattaan. A mehe atin ibeen atin leesuuje mele.
ꞌDooꞌdi wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho walah us atin kaꞌdiiꞌdo mele, iꞌdaasenyi ani a iꞌdiiꞌda. Wihi us ikaꞌdiiꞌdo la, a jeenteti jiti icho kajiraane an cheeko a suuj ikadowo.
Atin nyaama ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem irda, daawtaas gela. An daawtaas ma irdi. Iꞌdi tahe ibeenkeey uliba a ankhanyahe.”
Inkoo us wahaas yidah ka, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya geeddoor fiddiye.
Inkoo walaalinyetiis daawtaas iratte ka, Yeesso laka irte. Iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdóoꞌd ma istusine, dagsi on ka irte.
Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud la Yeesso daawtaas goyaka yowatte, ꞌdooꞌd, “Yeesso mehe agarteen?” idowte.
Urur goyaka nyunnyuutoti usu miinsan kahte. ꞌDooꞌd gaasoo mehe essa ya, “Us a eti haaggan.”
Gaasoo la mehe laabeen ya, “Mele, us enenyete ekkeesta.”
Iꞌdaasenyi etoo kaldaye issoobahcho, runtiis kayeyyeedo ma jiro. Iꞌdi tahe ꞌdooꞌd tuumman weynaanti Yaꞌhuude karoora.
Inkoo daaw ukkuriche leeleele ka, Yeesso minki Waakhe buure gele, ꞌdooꞌd Yeedi Waakh abinnaan sookhabte.
Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud, chiꞌche saggi us ꞌdooꞌd walah iabcho daagte ka, weyti girmeysatte, wihi iche worsatte, “Eta injire sukkuul iiran, intoh kharata geeddee kaꞌhele?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Waha an ꞌdooꞌd abcho, yeedeey on menye, a yeedi eti isooergate kayimiy.
Eti tuummane wihi Waakh ꞌdoono yeelin ꞌdoono, usú waha an atin abcho Waakh kayimaateen ommos usú yeedeey on tahe a abta.
Eti wihi awtiissa on ꞌdooꞌd abcho, magahe isiyowta. Iꞌdaasenyi eti magahi eti sooergate koolo iꞌdoono, a eti rummaate, walah khollokkhane usu miinsan mele.
Muusa amurre ma atin siinna? Iꞌdaasenyi etiin amurretaas raaho mele. A iꞌdoh ani ogoos imarantaan?”
Urur chirraakka wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Ati ginna kidakhatta. Ayyo ogoos kimarma?”
Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Wohoo kaldaye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaaꞌdane yeele, atin tuumman la girmeysatteen.
Muusa goorat hugunki atin yeeletiin kakhandiitaan a atin siiche. Rumanka hugunka Muusa ma kiimaatan, iꞌdaasenyi aacchinyetiinna kasoouummame. Jeentetaase yeeletiin Seeri Lanaso laka ikhandiitaan.
Chirri yeele Seeri Lanaso lakhandiyo, ꞌdee amurre Muusa liijebin, a iꞌdohe jeenteti an Seeri Lanaso enenyet sartiis tuumman isamaachuu ihollowtaan?
Taba uurassiin goyaka walah wihi atin kaagartaan kalday ka uskeel iigoonna, jiti fissan ikagoocha.”
ꞌDooꞌdoo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem wihi us yidah, “Us eta, eti weynaane ogoos maranto menya?
Ulla kalla ꞌdow kayeyyeeda, weynaanti Yaꞌhuud la walah iche itadeeh mele. Sarka saggi rumanka us Ki Lasubhe iyahe garatta?
Iꞌdaasenyi eta inti us kayimiy a garanna. Ki Lasubhe la maanti us yamiit, et inti us kayamiit garti mele.”

Yeesso minki Waakhe buure ka ꞌdooꞌd walah abche, riire, wihi us yidah, “Atin rumanka eti an ahe ichoow inti an kiimiy a garattaan on a? An ma issooerganne, iꞌdaasenyi ki isooergate a ki rum leh. Atin la usu ma garattaan.
Iꞌdaasenyi an usu a garda, iꞌdi tahe an usu kiimiyye, usu la isooergate.”
Waha ka ꞌdooꞌd Yeesso khaban leheete, iꞌdaasenyi et usu khabte mele. Iꞌdi tahe ibeenki liichiire lakhabti, uliba a ankhanyahe.
Iꞌdaasenyi urur goyaka ꞌdooꞌdi ittaawe Yeesso rummeeste, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Ki Lasubhe maanti us yamiit, wahanyeyyohi ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso eta yeele kussan a yeela?”
Farissaayo ururi woriis kanyunnyuwo daagte. ꞌDeerka kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskartoo Yeesso khabatti ergeen.
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “An geeddoor on atin leejira, ꞌdee yomboka eti isooergate inokhda.
Atin a iyowattaane, iꞌdaasenyi ma iꞌhessaan. Iꞌdi tahe inti an kajiro ma tamiitiin.”

Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud isinokhatte wihi iche isworsatte, “Inta us irti, inno usu ikaꞌhelin a intoh? Inti ꞌdooꞌdeen kijiro yaafohi Yaꞌhuud ieheynan goya kataasanyahe iche irta yaafohi Yaꞌhuud ieheynan wori Waakh abcha?
Yeeda us, ‘Atin a iyowattaane, ma iꞌhessaane toro inti an kajiro la ma tamiitiin,’ essi a mehe?”
Ibeenki weyti khummane ꞌdaꞌddaboote daawe massatti ka, Yeesso tolossate riire, wihi us yidah, “Eti tuummane sugub khabo, ani a iyimaate, amba sugub bahchaa.
Iꞌdi Chiirnaanneti Waakh tadeeh u, ‘Eti tuummane ani irummeeste, a iꞌdoo indohi biccheete ꞌdulo, jiroti jirtuu imassan lakeelo, uuriis kasoobahaan.’

Yeesso yeedaas ka la, wihi us woriis kayeyyeedo, a Rubeyti Munyeenye, ꞌdooꞌdi usu rummeeste sooꞌhelo. Geeddaka uliba Waakh ꞌdooꞌdi Kiriisto rummeeste Rubeyta Munyee ma siin. A mehe Yeesso geeddaakka goobi Waakh ka ma laweynaan.
Urur goyaka ꞌdooꞌd gaasoo yeeda daage wihi us yidah, “Eta rumanka, a eti Waákh íyeyyeedo goorat Waakh ayyiche, Waakh, ‘A sooerga,’ yidah.”
Gaasoo la mehe essaan ya, “Usu a Ki Lasubhe.”
Iꞌdaasenyi gaasoo mehe worsateen ya, “Ki Lasubhe saggoh boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ikayamiit?
Chiirnaanneti Waakh, Ki Lasubhe hiiy karnati Dawuud layadeeh ichoow ilkerengeetti Beꞌdeleheeme Dawuud yiille kayamiit ma tadeeh a?
Jeente Yeessuu, ꞌdooꞌd seley goggowe.
Gaasoo ichehi khabatti ꞌdoonta, iꞌdaasenyi et khabti mele.
Chirri iskare nokhatte ka, Farissaayo ichoow kuhaaniyyohi wewween ba wihi icho iskar worsateen, “A iꞌdoh Yeesso isookhaatina?”
Iskare la wihi iche tidah, “Et injire saggi eta iyeyyeedo nah daagne mele.”
Farissaayo toro wihi iche iskar itidah, “Atin laka a atin baabiiche?
Etoo weene ommos Farissaayeenye usú rummeeste a agarteen?
Mele! Iꞌdaasenyi urura amurre Muusa wihichekoo rucchul laka igaran a falanyahe.”
Etoo Farissaayeenye goycho kajiro Nikodeemo layadeehe goorat ꞌhor Yeesso iirte la wihi us icho worsate,
“Amurreteen enenyet geeddi wihi us yeelo liikadaagine toro liikagaran on uskeel igoossa?”
Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Ati laka boroofenhi Gaalilaaya katimiy? Bal Chiirnaanneti Waakh goya tabe, ꞌdee saggi ꞌdooꞌdi Waákh íyeyyeedo koo kalday laka injire boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ikiimaatan abo.”
Ebba ꞌdeerka goobiis irte.
Uuꞌ tol massate, Yeesso Hali Geeyohi Oolif irte.
Ibeenki kaas sooraaho baryo ka, toro Yeesso minki Waakhe buure isoonokhte. ꞌDooꞌd tuumman la kasoourure, ulla orronte,
Tagaammeti amurre ichoow Farissaayo ba makhaabassoo ichehi makhaabaloo kiche ieheynan leeuꞌdurto lakhabte sookhaateene, enenyet ortiis keeneen.
Wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Eti ween, makhaabassa ichehi makhaabaloo kiche ieheynan leeuꞌdurto iche lakhabte.
Amurre Muusa ka la, oboorrihi iꞌdaase dagahe lakaseya layagiis. At la mehe tadeeh?”
Icho la jeenteti icho wahaas iworsateen, Yeesso angey gelin ꞌdoonaane ꞌdee jitoo icho usu kacheektaan khabaan.
Iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso gulguubsate farriis ka il chirchiire.
Geedda icho toollaane yeedaas wowworsataan, Yeesso fit tolossate, wihi us iyidah, “Bal etiinki uskeel laa, kolooraat makhaabal dagah a kaseyo.”
Toro gulguubsate il chirchiire.
Chirri icho waha daageen ka, icho tuumman seley tabeene, tattakkay ka irteen. Kolooraat la araarrinye iratte, ichoowka Yeesso ichoow makhaabál kalday sooꞌhadeen.
Yeesso fit tolossate, wihi us makhaabál worsate, “Weela, ꞌdooꞌdi kootte kicheekti meeke? Et uskeel kigoocho mele?”
Makhaabale la wihi iche ilaabte, “Eti weenoow ebba.”
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Annaka uskeel ma kigoocho gon. Tabe, jirotaahti haꞌdaabeet ꞌdii.”
Yeesso toro ꞌdooꞌd leeyyeede wihi us iyidah, “An a banayhi harra. Eti tuummane isooraaho, jirtuu mugꞌdi goya ma kaassohti, iꞌdaasenyi banayhi jiro lakeelo siicha.”
Farissaayo la wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “At toolla awtaahha on kaayyeedda, gartaah rum mee.”

Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an awteey kaayyeedo laka, wihi an eldi a rum. Iꞌdi tahe inti an kiimiy a garda, toro la inti an isohdi a garda. Iꞌdaasenyi atin inti an kiimiy ma garattaane, ommos inti an isohdi ma garattaan.
Atin jiti weeli enenyete walah kagoossaan, ani la et an uskeel igoocho mele.
Iꞌdaasenyi chiꞌ kootte incheenka an ꞌdooꞌd hukkumo, jiti an ꞌdooꞌd kahukkumo a ki rummaat. A mehe an waha keley ma yeelo, Aabbaheeyki isooerge a ileejira.
Amurretiin goyaka wihi chiiran, ‘Chirri et lamma garti iche laabto too kalday tahe, aytaas a rum.’
An rumanka awtaaya kaayyeeda, toro la Aabbaheeyki ani isooerge laka garteey a laaba.”
ꞌDeerka wihi icho Yeesso worsateen, “Aabbahaah meeke?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin ani ma igarattaane ommos Aabbaheey laka ma garattaan. Chirri kootte atin ani igarattaan, Aabbaheey laka a garattaan gon.”
Yeesso inti minki Waakhe buure ka saanduukhi sadakha lakachibo yaal, iche ꞌdooꞌd walah kaabche, toro wahaas tuumman keesse. Et usú khabte la mele, a mehe ibeenkiis uliba a ankhanyahee.
Yeesso toro wihi us icho iyidah, “An a irda, atin la a iyowattaan. Iꞌdaasenyi inti an irdi ma tamiitiin. Uskeeliin goya katuuntaan.”
Jeenteti waha u, ewweenki Yaꞌhuud wihi us isworsate, “A isyagiis? Jeentetaase ‘Inti an irdi, ma tamiitiin,’ iessa?”
Iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Atin a ki ilane, anna a ki saraat. Atin a ki harratane, anna ki harrata mee.
Jeentaase uskeeliin goya katuuntaan atin ikiidah. Chirri atin eti an ahe an atin isoocheeke irummeysan, uskeeliin goya katuuntaan.”
Iche la wihi iche Yeesso worsatte, “At a ayyo?”
Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “An a eti an uus uumaccho ka an atin isoocheeke on.
Wihi buurenye atin miinsane an adeehe toro atin kahukkumo a jiraan. Iꞌdaasenyi eti isooerge a ki rum leh. Anna wihi an usu kadaage on ꞌdooꞌdi harrata icheeka.”
Icho la saggi Yeesso wor Aabbahiis ikayeyyeedo ma aban.

ꞌDeerka wihi us iyidah, “Maanti atin Ínam Aadam massalaaba ka serey geesseen, saggi an etaas iahe, a abattaan. Toro la saggi an wohoo rucchul laka miigteey ka iyeeline, iꞌdaasenyi an wihi Aabbaheey iabche on icheeko a abattaan.
Ki isooerge la ma ikatabine, a ileejira, iꞌdi tahe an kol tuumman wihi usu kahamaadicho on yeela.”
ꞌDooꞌdi buurenye yeeda Yeesso essi daage, Yeesso rummeeste.
Yeesso wihi us ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuude usu rummeeste iyidah, “Chirri atin wori an atin abche khucchissaan, atin rumanka a abattitaaya.
Runti Waakh a abattaane, runti Waakh la a atin furta.”
Icho la wihi icho usu ilaabeen, “Nah a nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham, toro et nah injire ifalle mele. Toollaka chirri at, ‘Runti Waakh a atin furta,’ nah idowto, mehe tussa?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane uskeel yeelo, a iꞌdoo us bowꞌdati uskeelaas yitah.
Bowꞌda min goyaka inti tichee ma khabto, iꞌdaasenyi inam jirtuu tuumman a ki minkaas on.
ꞌDeerka chirri Weeli Waakh kifure rumanka a furantahe.
Saggi atin nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham itahiin a garda. Iꞌdaasenyi ogoose imarantaan, iꞌdi tahe wihi an atin abcho ma rummeysattaan.
Wihi an inti Aabbaheey kajiro ka an arge a atin icheeke. Atin la wihi atin aabbahiin kadaagteen iche yeessaan.”
Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Aburaaham a aabbahaanya.”
Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri atin rumanka nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham tahiin, wihi us yeele atin laka a yeessaan.
Atin la anihi wihi rummaate tuummane an Waakh kadaage atin isoocheeke, iche ogoos imarantaan. Aburaaham injire wihi iꞌdaase ma yeelin.
Wahanyeyyohi aabbahiin yeele on atin laka yeessaan.” Icho la wihi icho ilaabeen, “Nah iꞌdi nyaakhuti eysingꞌalaje mee. Aabbahi kaldaye nah khabno a Waakh rubeytiissa.”
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Chirri kootte Waakh rumanka Aabbahiin yahe, ani a iꞌdoontaan. Iꞌdi tahe an Waakhe kiimiyye, toolla la an intane kajira. An awteey u ma imaatane, iꞌdaasenyi usu isooerge.
Kamalda bal, atin a iꞌdoh wihi an atin idowo matah atin igelin? A jeenteti atin wori an atin idowo atin aban iubaaꞌdan.

Atin a nyaakhuti Seytaanki ooyohiine. Wihi us imoono tuumman atin laka yeeline ꞌdoontaan. Uus uumaccho ka us eti ꞌdooꞌd bakkicho on eheet. Ulla toro rum a ꞌdiiꞌda, iꞌdi tahe us injire wihi rummaat ma cheekin. Chirra us yeedi beenaat cheeko la, wahaas eti rumanka us yahe tusaan. Us a eti been lehe, toro la a ooyohi ꞌdooꞌdi been goocho.
Iꞌdaasenyi an ayti rummaate atin icheeka, jeentetaase ani irummeysawwaayteen.
Ayyo goytiin ka saggi an rumanka uskeel iyeele tusa? Chirri an rum cheeko a iꞌdoh ani irummeysanna?
Eti Waakh kayimiy, Yeedi Waakh a dagansata. Atin la Waakh ma kiimaatan gone, jeentetaase ani nabah ikasudiwwaayteen.”
ꞌDooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Chirri nah, ‘At a yaafohi biꞌdirenye Saamariya toro la ginna kidakhatta,’ kinidah, nah ma eysiinna?”
Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Ani ginna ma idakhatti. Iꞌdaasenyi an Aabbahaaya koolo ikeena, atin la lakhaanyo ikadowtaan.
An koolo ma isiyowdi, iꞌdaasenyi eti anihi liikoolicho ꞌdoono a jira, ulla a eti jiti rummaat ka enenyet hukkumo.
Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane wihi an abcho raaho, jirtuu ma yamuut.”

Jeenteti waha u, ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud wihi us yidah, “Ya! Toolla saggi rumanka ginna kidakhatti a abanne. Aburaaham a yumuyye, ꞌdooꞌdi tuummane Waákh íyeyyeedo laka a tuume. Iꞌdaasenyi at mehe elatta ya, eti tuummane wihi at abisso raaho jirtuu ma yamuut.
Aburaahamhi aabbaheenyee a yumuyye, at usu a kaweentahe? ꞌDooꞌdi Waákh íyeyyeedo laka a tuume, at ayyo iskoogtahe?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an iskoolicho, koolohaas walah icho ibahaan mele. Eti koolo iꞌdoono a Aabbaheeyki atin a Waakkhiinna elattaan.
Atin injire usu ma garanne, anna usu a garda. Chirri ani, ‘An usu ma gardi,’ an atin iidah, annaka iꞌdiin u eti been lehe ateeh. Iꞌdaasenyi an usu a garda, yeediis la a raaha.
Aburaahamhi aabbahiine laka, emeetteey weyti kahamaade. Ulla goorat archiiy emeetteey a arge, weyti hamaade.”
ꞌDooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud la wihi us Yeesso iyidah “At guꞌh tomon chan laka ma eleelinne, toro Aburaaham a agarte?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, geeddi Aburaaham ijirin laka an a jira on.”
Jeenteti waha u dagah okhsatte, usu saataa. Iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso dagte, dagsi ka uranti minki Waakhe buure kabahe.
Yeesso jit raahaayi, etoo indo laan ladele arge.
Abatti Yeesso la wihi iche Yeesso worsatte, “Eti ween, eta a iꞌdoh indo laan liidele? Usú uskeel yeele bal ꞌdooꞌdi dele?”
Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Eta ommos ꞌdooꞌdi dele mee uskeel yeele. Iꞌdaasenyi waha a yitaaheene ꞌdee jirotiis ka saggi Waakh hil ihaaggicho laarga.
Geeddi il on maalim yahe, hili Waakkhi isooerge a haagginna. Mugꞌdi la a soogela, ki etoo kalday laka hil ihaaggin.
Geeddi an harrata on kajiro, an a eti ꞌdooꞌdi harra banay siicho.”
Inkoo Yeesso yeeda yidah ka, hanjuf harra katufe, doobbotoo haaggiche, et indo sarche kawelweele.
Wihi us et iyidah, “Nyaame, geꞌdinti Silowaam layadeeh ka fool dikho.” Iꞌda ka mehe leessa ya, “Eti leergate.” ꞌDeerka et irte, fool dikhte, usuhi il argo soonokhte.
Ollokkiis ichoow ꞌdooꞌdi tuummane ꞌhor usuhi walah daddaaho arge wihi icho worsateen, “Icho eta, eti orran fiddiyo walah daddaaho menya?”
Gaasoo wihi icho yidaaheen, “Aa, a usu.”
Gaasoo wihi icho yidaaheen, “Mele, usu menye, a etoo iyoog on.”
Iꞌdaasenyi et rubeytiis tirrime, “Aa, a ani!” yidah.
Icho la ihosseene, “Saggoh ꞌdeerka il iagarte?” idoween.
Wihi us iyidah, “Eti Yeesso layadeehe doobbotoo haaggiche, indo ikawelweele, ‘Nyaam, geꞌdinti Silowaam layadeeh ka fool dikho,’ iyidah. Anna ꞌdeerka irde, fool dikhde, il arge.”
“Eta intoh kajira?” worsateen.
Ulla, “An ma gardi,” iyidah.
Eti goorat indo laa sookhaateene, Farissaayo ikeeneen.
Ibeenki Yeesso doobbo haaggiche, eti indo laa samaache la, Seeri Lanaso eheneet.
Farissaayo toro saggi us il iarge worsatte, ulla wihi us ilaabe, “Et doobbotoo indoheey kawelweele, anna fool dikhde. Toolla la il a arga.”
Farissaayotoo la wihi iche tidah, “Eti waha yeele Waakh ma kiimaatan, iꞌdi tahe amuri Seeri Lanaso ma raaho.”
Iꞌdaasenyi gaasoo wihi icho worsateen, “Saggoh eti uskeel leh, wahanyeyyoha miigti Waakh tuso iyeela?” ꞌDeerka seley goote.
Farissaayo et toro inokhatte wihi iche itidah, “Et indo a kihaaggiche gone, mehe usu miinsane tadeeh?”
Et wihi us ilaabe, “Eta a eti Waákh íyeyyeedo.”
Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud uliba saggi eta ꞌhor indo ilaayahe toolla la us il iargo rummeysawwaayte, ichoowka ꞌdooꞌdi dele waheen.
Wihi icho worsateen, “Waha a inankiinna? Goorat indo laane desse elattaane, saggoh toolla il iarga?”
ꞌDooꞌdi dele wihi us ilaabe, “Saggi us weeleenyo iyahe a garanna, saggi us indo laan idesse laka a garanna.
Iꞌdaasenyi saggi us toolla il iarge ma garanni, ommolla eti indo haaggiche ma garanni. Usu worsada, ullaka a etoo weene, a isiyeyyeedo.”

ꞌDooꞌdi dele jeenteti icho waha iyidaaheen, a jeenteti icho weynaanti Yaꞌhuud ikarooraan. Iꞌdi tahe weynaane goorat mehe goosse ya, eti tuummane Yeesso a Ki Lasubhe cheeko, minki weysiite Yaꞌhuud a lakabahcha.
Jeentetaase ꞌdooꞌdi dele, “Us laka a etoo weene, worsada,” iyidah.
Koli lammaatteet inokhteene, eti indo laa waheene wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Waakh kooli, eta kisamaache saggi us eti uskeel leh iyahe a garanna.”
Et wihi us ilaabe, “Uskeel khabyeey ichoow kuus ka ba an ma gardi. Wohoo kalday on garda. An ꞌhor indo ma khabo, iꞌdaasenyi toolla il a arga.”
Wihi icho usu worsateen, “Iꞌdoh kiyidah? Saggoh indo kihaaggiche?”
Wihi us ilaabe, “An a atin isoocheeke, atin la ma daagtaan. A iꞌdoh toro daagin iꞌdoontaan? Atin laka sarka atinhi abattitiis tateehiine ꞌdoontaan?”
Farissaayo et leeabaarrante, wihi iche itidah, “At laka a abattiti etaase, nah la a abatti Muusa!
Saggi Waakh Muusa ileeyyeede a tissibna, iꞌdaasenyi etaas, inti us kayimiy laka ma garanni.”
Et la wihi us ilaabe, “Enenne waha a girmo! Atin eta inti us kayimiy ma garattaane, ulla indoheey a ihaaggiche!
Saggi Waakh ꞌdooꞌdi uskeel leh nabah ikasudin a garanna. ꞌDooꞌdi usú inkaanyito wihi us ꞌdoono yeelo la nabah a isuda.
Uus goorat harra lasoouume, eti injire eti indo laan desse indo haaggiche ma ladaagin.
Chirri kootte eta Waakh ikiimaatan, wohoo rucchul laka ma yeelo.”
Waha ka wihi icho laabeen, “At uskeel goya kadelatte, toro la uskeel goya on kaweynaatte. Saggoh toollaka nah walah nah iabissa?” Khar iseyeen.
Chirri Yeesso saggi icho et khar ikaseyeen daage ka, irte, etaas yowte, ꞌhele. Yeesso wihi us et iyidah, “At Ínam Aadam a rummeysatta?”
Et wihi us iyidah, “Eti ween, chirri at eti us yahe isoocheekte a rummeesda.”
Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “At toolla usu a agarte. Aniha kileeyyeedo a usu.”
Et ꞌdeerka wihi us yidah, “Kamur, a kirummeesda.” Et Yeesso wahte.
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “An harrata a imiyye enenyet hukkuma, ꞌdee ꞌdooꞌdi indo laa il arga, ki kol us il argo iskoog la indo waaya.”
Farissaayotoo intaas kijirte la wihi us essi daagte, wihi iche worsatte, “Nah laka indo laanahe?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri kootte atin indo laatahiin, uskeel atin khabtaan mele. Iꞌdaasenyi toolla atin ‘il a agarra,’ elattaan, waha saggi atin uliba uskeel ikajirtaane tusaan.”
Yeesso wihi us ꞌdooꞌd iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, eti sunki iiyyaat ka arit itabine, iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdossoo on tabe sum gele, etaas hatto leeyahe, toro la a eti enenyet walah saro.
Eti arit kagelo a ersinki iiytiissa.
Eti arit yaakhicho la ersim arite ifaha. Iiye la geeddi ersim iche tuumman magahenyetiche kaawwaho hooyiis a daagta. Ulla toro iiy a tuma, toro iiy ortiche raaha.
Chirra us iiy tuumman tumo, orcheeda raaha, iiye la ꞌdubiis raahta, iꞌdi tahe iiye hooyiis a garatta.
Iꞌdaasenyi iiye eti ersinkicho ieheynan ma raahto a kafiridda, iꞌdi tahe hooyiis ma garatti.”
Yeesso ꞌdooꞌd hawweesa icheeke, iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdooꞌd wihi hawweesa miinsanyahe ma aban.
Maantaka Yeesso toro wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, ani a iꞌdi aritti sunki iiyyaat.
ꞌDooꞌdi tuummane orteey yimiy a ki hatto lehe, enenyet walah saro, iꞌdaasenyi iiye icho nabah ma isudin.
Ani arite, eti tuummane ikasoogelo a lariba. Eta sum a soogela, toro la baha, yaakh yowta.
Eti walah hato, ogoos ichoow wihi us baabiicho on menye, walah addane us iyamiit mele. An la a imiyye ꞌdee jiro tuum ꞌhessaan.
“Ani a ersinki haaggan. Ersinki haaggan la jeenteti us iiytiis iribo on u, jirotiis a bahcha.
Eti lakireeste, iiy yaakhime igaranne iiye la tiis ieheynan, chuꞌus yaay arge, iiy a kataba, firda. Yaaye ꞌdeerka iiy goyaka koo tagiise, iiyti addan la seley baabaata.
Eti lakireeste iiye tiis mee gone, iiy la aw ma ikhabo gone, a kafirda.
“An a ersinki haaggan. Iiyteey a garda, iiyteey la a igaratta.
Saggi Aabbaheey ani igarti, iche ani laka Aabbaheey igarda. Anna jeenteti iiyteey u jiroteey a bahcha.
ꞌDooꞌdoo addane iꞌdi iiyteeyenye, woyheey goya ikajirin a jira. Kaas laka a soodowa. Icho laka hooyeey a dagansataane, icho tuumman la iꞌdi woyhoo kaldache ersinkoo kaldach khabo yateehiin.
Aabbaheey jeenteti us ani iꞌdoono, a jeenteti an jiroteey ibahcho, ꞌdee toro ꞌdaꞌddaboka an omoot ka isookaho.
Et jiroteey ikabahcho mele, iꞌdaasenyi ani on iꞌdaanu bahcha. Antohi an jiroteey kabahcho a khaba, toro antohi an isikasoolaabo a khaba. Amura Aabbahaaya kaꞌhele.”
Yeedaas us yidah ka, ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud toro seley gowe.
ꞌDooꞌd buurtiis mehe essa ya, “Eta ginna dakhatta, a sirgowe. A iꞌdoh idagansattaan?”
Iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdooꞌdoo addan mehe essa ya, “Waha yeyyeedi eti ginna dakhatti mee. Ginna eti indo laa indo a furta?”

Maantaas la Daawti Maanti Minki Waakhe Buure Ladikhe lakasooꞌhelo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme lakagele. Yeesso laka ꞌdeerka ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem irte. Maantaas la a hayohi il roffo yahe.
Yeesso la minki Waakhe buure goyaka intoo, Gaayim Soolomon layadeeh iche raaha.
Weynaantoo Yaꞌhuud Yeesso khaarisse, wihi iche itidah, “Ichoowka maantoh waha nah kadagissa? Chaꞌat Ki Lasubhe tahe, rum on nah isoocheek.”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “An orey on atin isoocheeke, iꞌdaasenyi atin ma irummeysan. Wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaaꞌdane an antohi magah Aabbaheey ka yeelo, eti an ahe cheekaane,
iꞌdaasenyi atin ma rummeysattaan, a mehe atin ꞌdooꞌdi iꞌdi iiyteeye mee.
ꞌDooꞌdi iꞌdi iiyteeye hooyeey a daaga, anna icho a garda, icho la ani a isooraahaan.
ꞌDooꞌdi ani isooraaho la jiroti jirtuu imassanne siicha, icho la jirtuu ma yamuutiin. Et dahanteey ikasaro mele.
Aabbaheeyki dahanteey soogesse walah tuumman a kaweenyahe, jeentetaas u la, et dahan Aabbaheey kabihin yabuuꞌd mele.
Ani ichoow Aabbaheey a koo kalday.”
Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud toro dagah okhsatte, Yeesso dagah kachibtaa.
Iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Anto Aabbaheey ka wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaaꞌdan goytiin ka a yeele. Waha an yeele goyaka, jeenteti kichekoh dagah ka ogoos iꞌdoontaan?”
Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Jeenteti haagga at yeesse mee dagah ikaasaano, iꞌdaasenyi a jeenteti at igafte. Iꞌdi tahe at a weeli enenyet one, toro Waakhe iskaayyeessa.”
Yeesso la wihi us icho ilaabe, “Amurretiin rubeyche ka mehe chiiran ya, ‘Waakh mehe yidah ya, atin a waakkhakh.’
Saggi atin igarattaan u, Chiirnaanneti Waakh ma luurgiyicho. Chirri ꞌdooꞌdaas Yeedi Waakh ꞌhele, ‘waakkhakh’ lakawahe,
ki Aabbaheey soobahsate kiis kayeesse harrata isooerge la? A iꞌdoh ꞌdeerka chaꞌan, ‘Ani a Weeli Waakh,’ idah, a gafe ielattaan?
Chirri an wihi Aabbaheey yeelo iyeelin, iirummeysanna.

Iꞌdaasenyi chirri an wihi Aabbaheey ꞌdoono yeelo toro la atin ani irummeysan laka, wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaaꞌdan rummeesda. Iꞌda ka saggi Aabbaheey goyteey ikijiro anna goytiis ikijiro a abattaan.”
ꞌDooꞌd toro Yeesso khaban leheete, iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdooꞌd goya tabe kabahsate.
Yeesso ꞌdeerka toro nokhte, hawti Yoordan aficheki ꞌdiri goorat Yoohana ꞌdooꞌd kabaattissiyo imaahe, intaas fiddiye.
ꞌDooꞌdi buure la Yeesso iyimiy. Wihi icho yidaaheen, “Chirri goorat Yoohana wohoo miigti Waakh tuso iyeelin laka, wihi eta miinsane us yidah tuumman a rum.”
ꞌDooꞌdi buure la intaakka Yeesso rummeeste.
Maantooka etoo Laassaro layadeehe ilkerengeetti Beꞌdaaniya yaal khannate. Albehi leeddesse too Maariya tahe too la Maarta tahe laka ilkerengeettaas Beꞌdaaniya yaalliin.
Maariyata la a ti ꞌdee Kamur miricchi luhlo kasubahto, tintiche la kahiyyaayto.
Albeha isleedesse, Yeesso farniin iꞌdiiche, “Kamur, aalaahki at weyti ꞌdoonto a khannanyahe,” iyidah.
Chirri us waha daage ka, Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Khannaata omoot ma kamassati. Khannaata a yateehe ꞌdee Waakh laweynaacha, ꞌdee khannaata ka Weeli Waakh laweynaacha.”
Yeesso la Maarta ichoow walaassicheti Maariya layadeeh ichoow walaalichoki Laassaro layadeeh ba a ꞌdoona.
Iꞌdaasenyi inkoo us farniinkaas ꞌhele, us saggi Laassaro ikhannanyahe daage laka, Yeesso intaas us kajire ibeen lamma addane fiddiye.
ꞌDeerka wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Kaha, boroofenhi Yaꞌhuudiya a inokhanni.”
Iꞌdaasenyi abatti wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Eti ween, ibeenneta dow on menya weynaanti Yaꞌhuud dagah kaachibin leheete, kiigaasan leheet? Atihi toro intaas inokhatti ꞌdoonta?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Orrahti maantoo kaldach sahaꞌd tomon ichoow lamma ma khabto? Eti maalim sohti, ma tarraantarrati, iꞌdi tahe etaas eti harrata banay siicho, iche arga.
Chirri us ibeen sohti a tarraantarrata, a mehe banay ma khabo.”
Yeesso inkoo us waha yidah ka, wihi us toro iyidah, “Aaleenki Laassaro layadeeh a urꞌde, iꞌdaasenyi an irda neybaacha.”
Abattitiis wihi iche ilaabte, “Kamur, chirri us urꞌdo ꞌdee a deefsata on gon.”
Yeesso la saggi rumanka Laassaro iyumuyye kaayyeeda, iꞌdaasenyi abatti kol us wori urꞌdumme on kayeyyeedo koogtahe.
Yeesso ꞌdeerka abatti ma kaaddaginne, “Laassaro a yumuy,” iyidah.
“Toro la jeentetiin u, an a hamaada chirri maanti us yumuy an intaas ikajirin. Waha tuumman atine indigir atin ikhabaane, ꞌdee ani irummeysattaan. Iꞌdaasenyi kaaleya usu iiranni.”
Toomashi Manꞌdaan layadeeh, wihi us abattiti addan iyidah, “Inno tuumman eti ween raahno, ꞌdee inno tuumman a leetuunno.”
Chirri Yeesso ilkerengeetti Beꞌdaaniya soogele ka, saggi Laassaro ibeen affar kutte liihawwaale abte.
Ilkerengeetti Beꞌdaaniya la geeddi kiilomitta seyyahe ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ileejirta.
ꞌDooꞌdi Yaꞌhuude ittaawe la a yimiyye Maarta ichoow Maariya uur khoboocheen, jeenteti omoot walaalichuu.
Chirri Maarta saggi Yeesso isoosohti daagte ka, bahte or kadowte. Iꞌdaasenyi Maariya goob kaꞌhadde.
Maarta wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Kamur, kootte at inta kajirte ka, walaaleey ma yamuut!
Iꞌdaasenyi toolla laka saggi wihi tuummane at Waakh daahte Waakh kiyeelo, a garda.”
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Walaalaah omoot a kasookaha.”
Maarta wihi iche ilaabte, “Saggi us ibeenki yomboot omoot ikasookaho a garda.”
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Ani enenyet omoot kasookahcha, toro jiro siicha. Eti tuummane ani irummeeste, chirri us yumuy laka jiro a ꞌhela.
Eti tuummane toolla jiro, ani irummeeste la, jirtuu tuumman ma yamuut. At waha a rummeysatta?”
Iche la wihi iche itidah, “Aa, Kamur, saggi at Ki Lasubhe itahe, at Weeli Waakhe goorat harrata yamiit itahe, a rummeesda.”
Inkoo Maarta waha tidah ka, nokhatte, walaassicheti Maariya layadeeh ꞌdol iwahte wihi iche itidah, “Eti Ween kallaaye, ati laka a kiwaha.”
Inkoo Maariya waha daagte ka, dowwa kahte Yeesso iiratte.
Yeesso uliba ilkerengeet ma soogeline iꞌdaasenyi inti kootte Maarta kaꞌhesse on kajira.
ꞌDooꞌdi Yaꞌhuude kootte Maariya leejire, uur khoboocho, chirra iche dowwa bahte ka, leebaheen. A mehe kol iche hawwaal iratti kooyto koogyahiin.
Maariya inti Yeesso kajire sooeleesse, uus iche Yeesso agarte ka, luhlohiis ka jilbo il kaguꞌdubte, wihi iche tidah, “Kamur, kootte at inta kajirte ka, walaaleey ma yamuut.”
Chirri Yeesso ichehi ooyto arge ka, ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuude leejiro laka usuhi ooyo arge, rubeye weyti uskulaatte, mal gele.
Wihi us worsate, “Intoh kahawwaasseen?”
Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Kamur, kaale agar.”
Yeesso ooye.
ꞌDooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud la wihi us isiyidah, “Bal geeddi us Laassaro ꞌdoono yeya!”
Iꞌdaasenyi gaasoo mehe yidaaheen ya, “Eti indo laa goorat indo a haaggichee, a iꞌdoh, Laassaro omoot ikaholin?”
Yeesso toro weyti rubeye uskulaatte, hawwaassi goꞌdenye daddaabtoo buure af lakorche hagga irte.
Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Daddaab bahcha.”
Iꞌdaasenyi Maartati Laassarohi yumuy leedelatte wihi iche tidah, “Kamur, kola a nuuhe, ibeen affar kutte lahawwaalee.”
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “An kootte chaꞌat saggi waha iyateehiin rummeysatte weynaanti Waakh a agarta ma kiidaahan a?”
Daddaab hawwaal afiche lakabahche. Yeesso ꞌdeerka serey yeye, wihi us yidah, “Aabba, jeenteti at ani idaagtuu, kalaꞌde kisoolaaba.
Saggi at kol dakkhan idaagto a garda, iꞌdaasenyi jeenteti ꞌdooꞌdane waha iadeehe, ꞌdee icho la saggi at ani isooergatte rummeestaan.”
Inkoo us waha yidah ka weyti riire, “Laassaro, soobah!” yidah.
Eti yumuy soobahe. Usuhi dahanohiis ichoow luhlohiis ba darfohi eti yumuy lakaayyuubo kaayyubanyahiin soobahe. Fool laka dafare kayuuban. Yeesso la wihi us ꞌdooꞌd iyidah, “Furfura, ꞌdee a irti.”
ꞌDooꞌdi Yaꞌhuude ittaawenye, Maariya bariito yimiy, wihi Yeesso yeele arge, Yeesso rummeeste.
Iꞌdaasenyi gaasichokoo Farissaayo inokhteene, wihi Yeesso yeele icheekeen.
Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo ba Jaldaabti Weene Yaꞌhuud tol iwaheen.
Wihi icho worsateen, “Mehe yeello? Bal wahanyeyyoha ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso eta yeelo yeya!
Chirri inno usu ꞌdiinne us sagga isossohti, ꞌdooꞌd tuumman usu a rummeesta. ꞌDeerka ꞌdooꞌdi wewweene ili Rooma yamiite, minkeenki Waakhe buure ichoow yaafteen tuummamba baabiichaan.”
Koo leejire Kayaafa layadeehe ullaka guꞌhaas ka kuhaanihi weyti weene sooyeede wihi us yidah, “Wohoo rucchul laka ma garattaan!
Ichehi yaaf tuumman bakkatti ka, usuhi etoo kalday meessi ꞌdooꞌd tuumman kayamuut menya deefto?”
Ulla waha us yidah, wihi usu kasoouummame mee. Iꞌdaasenyi jeenteti us guꞌhaas ka kuhaanihi weyti ween iyahe, iche wori Waakhe saggi Yeesso meessi yaafohi Yaꞌhuud ikayamuut ikaayyeede.
Toro la Yeesso jeenteti yaaftaas kalday on ma iyamuute, iꞌdaasenyi jeenteti nyaakhuti Waakhe taasane iyamuute, ꞌdee ꞌdooꞌdi harra tuumman isikeena, wohoo kalday kayeela.
Uus maalinkaas la, weynaanti Yaꞌhuud tossatte, jiti iche Yeesso katagiis yowatte.
Maantaka Yeesso inti yaafohi Yaꞌhuud kaargaan ma kaassahan. Yeesso intaas katabe, abattitiis khabaayi irte, ilkerengeettoo hidaad haggeenye Efireem layadeeh irte, fiddiye.
Maanti Daawti Yaꞌhuude Baasakka lahaaggicho soodowwaatte ka, ꞌdooꞌdi ittaawe ilicho kabahe, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikore, daawtichoti Isladikho Baasakka orcheenye gelaanee.
Icho tuumman la Yeesso yowtaan. Chirri icho minki Waakhe buure yimaateen ka, wihi icho isworsateen, “Atin maanta kol us daawta yamiite koogtahiin?”
Iꞌdaasenyi kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo amur bahcheene, chiꞌ etoo inti Yeesso kajiro garti, a soocheeko, ꞌdee a khabteen.
Geeddi ibeen lihe ankhantahe ꞌdee daawti Baasakka sootateeh, Yeesso ilkerengeetti Beꞌdaaniya Laassaro yaal yimiy. Laassaro la, a eti goorat Yeesso omoot kasookahche.
Yeesso intaas ka gololi gelebeet liikarche. Maarta la icho goollisse. Laassaro ꞌdooꞌdi Yeesso leegolossate a leejire.

Maariya ꞌdeerka miricchihoo gato miigenye geeyoo naad layadeeh kalday lakahaaggiche geeddi kiilo nyuusichee khaatte, Yeesso luhlo kasubahte, toro tintiche ka luhlohiis hiyyaayte. Uyuuggi miricchihaas min tuumman leekahe.
Iꞌdaasenyi etoo abatti Yeesseenye, Yuuda Iskaariyoot layadeehe, dowwanoha ka Yeesso ꞌdub soogoocho ꞌdiiꞌde wihi us yidah,
“A iꞌdoh miricchiha liiororinne, ꞌdee chilimme miskiin liisiin? Chilimmeti eti guꞌhoo hil haaggiche laguto iche baha.”
Jeenteti us miskiino uur ikasoonugleeste mee waha iyidah. Jeenteti us iꞌdaas iyidah, a jeenteti us ugarti chilimme ikhuccho, us chilimme ihato.
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “ꞌDii! Iche miricchiha ibeenki ani liihawwaalo iche meel igelissee.
Miskiin kol dakkhan goytiinna kakhabtaane, iꞌdaasenyi ani kol dakkhan ma ikhabtaan.”
Ururoo buurenye Yaꞌhuud Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Beꞌdaaniya kajiro daage, intaas yimiy. Icho la jeenteti icho Yeesso iargaan kalday menye, Laassarohi Yeésso omoot kasookahche laka argine yimaateen.
Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ꞌdeerka jiti icho Laassaro laka kayagiisiin yowteen.
Waha a jeenteti ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuude ittaawe jeente Laassaruu icho ikatabo, Yeesso irummeesti.
Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, ururi buurenye daawti Baasakka yimiy, saggi Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem iyamiit daage.
Seytohi geeyi baar sookhaateene, baheene, Yeesso or kadoween. Chirra icho or kadowaan la a riiraane,
“Waakh a lakoolicho!”
“Waakh ki magahi Kamur kayamiit a imaale.”
“Waakh Karnati Issiraayel a imaale!” iche essaan.
Yeesso inkuraarruhoo ꞌhele kore, iꞌdi liichiiruu,
“ꞌDooꞌdi ilkerengeetti Saayon yaal, wohoo rucchul laka akaroorina!
Yeya karnatiin kalla,
inkuraarru fuulaayi soosohtaa.”
Abattitiis laka kolooraat waha tuumman ma aban. Inkoo Yeesso goobi Waakh ka laweynaache on iche saggi yeedaas lachiire usu imiinsanyahe, toro wahaas laka usu iyeeleen kaseen.
Ururi goorat maanti Yeesso Laassaro goꞌddi lakahawwaale goya kasoowahe omoot kasookahche leejire, wihi yitah tuumman cheeke.
ꞌDooꞌdi buure jeenteti Yeesso waha miigti Waakh tuso iyeele us idaage, iche ibahe Yeesso iꞌhele.
Farissaayo ꞌdeerka wihi iche isitidah, “Ma agartaan a, wihi inno yeelin leheet ma yeelloo! ꞌDooꞌd tuumman usu raaha!”
ꞌDooꞌdi daawti Baasakka ka irte ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka Waakh wahte, ꞌdooꞌdoo yaafohi Yaꞌhuud ieheynan laka goycho a kijire.
ꞌDooꞌdaas la Fiilifhi ilkerengeetti Bessaayda boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto kayimiy iirte, wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Eti ween, nahi Yeesso agarro ꞌdoonna.”
Fiilif la irte Andereeya icheeke, lammache ba iratte Yeesso icheekte.
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Sahaꞌddi Ínam Aadam laweynaacho kola a titah.
Rume atin icheeka, sammata ilinti ꞌdargaayye il ikadihine, iche koloo iumaatan, ilintoo on kafiddiita, gurnaan iche desso mele. Iꞌdaasenyi chiꞌiche wohoo yumuy titah, gurnaanki buurenye dessa.
Eti jiroti awtiis ꞌdoono, jiroti rummaat a waaya. Eti harrata ka jirotiis ꞌdiiꞌdo la, jirotiis jiroti jirtuu imassan a ikaaya.
Eti tuummane falfateey itaahan ꞌdoono, ani isooraaha. Meelbaaw an irdi ka ileejira. Aabbaheey la eti tuummane hileey haaggicho, usú a weynaacha.
“Toolla rubeyteey a suujowte, mehe idaahe? ‘Aabbahaaw, sahaꞌdda sinayyoot ikarib,’ iche adeeh? Mele! An jeentetane sahaꞌdda isooeleele.
Aabba, magahaah weynaay!”
Hooyoo ꞌdeerka serey ka sooyeede, mehe yidah ya, “Magaheey a weynaache, toro la a inokhda weynaacha.”
Ururi intaas toolle hooyaas daage gaasoo, “A guuguh,” esse, gaasoo la, “Hertoo Waakhe leeyyeedda,” esse.
Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Hooya jeenteteey ma isooyeedine, jeentetiinna isooyeede.
Ibeenki Waakh ꞌdooꞌdi harrata hukkumo kola a yitah. Waakh toolla karnati harrata a riha.
Iꞌdaasenyi ani maanti massalaaba ka serey liiokkhicho, weeli enenyet tuumman ankaaya keena.”
Iꞌdane yidahye, omootti us sooyamuut enenyet tusa.
Urur la wihi us iyidah, “Amurre Muusa ka, Ki Lasubhe jirtuu tuumman a inno leefiddiya iche daagne. Saggoh ꞌdeerka ‘Ínam Aadam serey a liiokkhicha’ itadeeh? ‘Ínam Aadamha,’ a ayyo?”
Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Geeddoo rucchul on banay khabtaan. Banay goya kasohda giꞌde, geeddi banay jiraane mugꞌdi ikhaatin. Eti mugꞌdi kasohti, inti us isohti ma garti.
Anihi banay atin ikeeno, geeddi an atin leejiro irummeesda, ꞌdee atin laka ꞌdooꞌdi banay goya kasohti ateeha.” Inkoo Yeesso waha yidah ka, ꞌdooꞌd katabe, irte dagte.
Chirri Yeesso wahanyeyyoha miigti Waakh tuso tuumman geedda ꞌdooꞌd leejiro us yeele laka, ꞌdooꞌd usu ma rummeysan.
Wahaas la a yitaaheene ꞌdee wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh ka lachiire labuuhicha,
“Kamur, ayyo wori nah cheekne rummeeste?
Ayyo miigti Waakh latuse?”
Jeenteti icho irummeysawwaayeen la, a jeenteti Isaaya intoo addan ka iꞌda iyidah,
“Waakh icho indo a tire,
uurassicho la dagahnooche,
ꞌdeerka indohicho ka il ma argaane,
ommos uurassicho ka walah ma abtaan,
ommos ani ma isoonokhtaane ꞌdee ma samaacho.”
Isaaya jeenteti us waha iyidah, a jeenteti us weynaanti Kamur iarge, toro wori usu miinsan ikayeyyeede.
Chirraas weynaanti Yaꞌhuud buurche laka usu a rummeysatte. Iꞌdaasenyi jeenteti iche Farissaayo ikaroortuu, saggi iche Yeesso ikakhuufte ma cheekin, minki weysiite Yaꞌhuude lakabahcho iche karoortaa.
Iꞌdi tahe koolohi Waakh icho koolicho menye, koolohi weeli enenyet icho koolicho iche ꞌdoonaan.
Yeesso riire wihi us yidah, “Eti tuummane ani irummeesti, ani kalday ma irummeesti, iꞌdaasenyi ki ani isooerge laka a rummeesta.
Eti tuummane ani iargo la, ki ani isooerge laka a arga.
An iꞌdi banayhi harratane iimiyye, ꞌdee et ani irummeesti mugꞌdi goya fiddiyo mele.
“Eti yeedeey daago iꞌdaasenyi iraahin an ma hukkumo. Iꞌdi tahe an hukkunnaanki an harra hukkumo ma iimaatan, iꞌdaasenyi ribnaanki ꞌdooꞌdi harra iimiy.
Eti ani iꞌdiiꞌdo toro yeedeey ikhaatan, wihi hukkumo a jiraan. Yeedaas an idah rubeytiissa ibeenki yomboot etaas sina igoochá.
A mehe an antoheey ma kaayyeedin. Iꞌdaasenyi Aabbaheeyki isooerge iche amur ibahche, wihi an adeeh ichoow saggi an iadeeh isiiche.
Anna saggi amuriis jiroti jirtuu imassan ikeeno a garda. Toollaka wihi an eldi tuumman a wihi Aabbaheey dah iyidah on.”

Geeddi ibeenki daawti Baasakka iitaahan, Yeesso saggi ibeenki us harrata katabo, us Aabbahiis iirti kola iyitah garte. Yeesso la ichoowka maanti jirotiisti harrata soomassatti laka, ꞌdooꞌdiis a ꞌdoone.
Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba gololi gelebeete yamhiin. Seytaan la Yuuda Iskaariyoothi inam Siimone mali suujenye us Yeesso ꞌdub kagoocho orey on rubeytiis gesse.
Yeesso saggi Aabbahiis walah tuumman dahantiis igesse a garta, saggi us Waakh ikayimiyye us toro Waakh ikanokhti a garta.
ꞌDeerka kombor kasookahe, dafartiisti oroot duumiche, dafarti chirri ladikhte lakahiyyaayti dabar kahiite.
Wahaas ꞌdubicho ka, karaayatoo bicche kachibe, abattitiis luhlo dikhe, dafarti kootte us dabar kahiite ka hiyyaaye.
Chirri us Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh sooeleele ka, Beetero wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, luhlo idikhta?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi an yeelo toolla wihicho ma abatti, iꞌdaasenyi yomboka a abatta.”
Beetero la wihi us iyidah, “At koloo kalday laka luhlo ma idikhto.”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an luhlo kidikhin, at keey mee.”
Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Kamur, ꞌdeerka luhlo kalday iidikhine, iꞌdaasenyi dahano ichoow matah laka idikh giꞌde.”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eti kootte sar tuumman dikhte, yomboka luhlo kalday on dikhta. Iꞌdi tahe sartiis tuumman chaafo ma khabto. Buurtiin a dikhantahe, iꞌdaasenyi atin tuumman mee dikhan.”
A mehe us ꞌhor on eti ꞌdub goocho garte, jeentetaase, “Atin tuumman mee dikhan,” iyidah.
Inkoo Yeesso abattitiis luhlo dikhe, us dafartiisti oroot toro gessate ka, inti kootte us ꞌhor fiddiye koorronte. Wihi us icho iyidah, “Kamalda bal, wihi toolla an atin iyeele wihicho a abatteen?
Atin ani, ‘Eti ween,’ ichoow, ‘Kamur,’ menya itadeehiin? Aa! A iꞌdaas on gon. An rumanka a eti weene, toro la a Kamur.
Anihi Kamuriinenye toro la etiinki weene, toolla luhlo a atin dikhe. Taba giꞌde atin laka luhlo isdikha.
An jit a atin tuse, ꞌdee atin laka wihi an atin iyeele ꞌdooꞌdi addan iyeessaan.
Rume atin icheeka, falfá kamuriche kaween mele, ommos eti ergaanee eti ergate ma kaween.
Toolla ꞌdeerka atin runta garattaan, a hamaadoo geeddohe chaꞌatin wihi atin liiꞌdoono yeessaan.
“Wora an kaayyeedo atin tuumman mee atin miinsanyahe. ꞌDooꞌdi rumanka an soobahsade a garda. Iꞌdaasenyi Chiirnaanneti Waakhe, ‘Eti ileegolossate on toro chiiy iyitah,’
“Waha geeddi icho iitaahane atin isoocheeka, ꞌdee maanti icho yitaaheen laka, saggi an eti an ahe, an atin isoocheeke iahe rummeysattaan.
Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane eti an sooergade khaatti, ani ikhaatta. Eti ani ikhaatti la, eti isooergate khaattta.”
Inkoo us waha yidah ka, Yeesso weyti uur suujowe, wihi awtiis miinsan abatti icheeke, wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, etiinkoo ꞌdub igoocha.”
Abattitiis isyeyte, etichoki yeedaas miinsanyahe fooliis waayte.
Abatti goyaka, etoo kachka Yeesso weyti ꞌdoono, Yeessó garabiissa fiddiya.
Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh etaas abattee far iooge, wihi us iyidah, “Bal eti us woriis kaayyeedo, eti tahe worsada.”
Etaas abattee Yeesso kasiihsate wihi us worsate, “Kamur etaas a ayyo?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Etaas, a eti toolla an makaatetoor idiibo inkoo an karam kalugꞌde.” Yeesso ꞌdeerka makaatetoor karam goya kalugꞌde, Yuuda Iskaariyoothi inam Siimone iooge.
Uus Yuuda makaate khaate, Seytaan goytiis gele.
Yeesso la wihi us Yuuda iyidah, “Nyaam, wihi at sooyeesso dowwa yeel!”
Iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdooꞌdi addane leegolossati et jeenteti Yeesso waha iyidah garti mele.
Yuuda gon chilimme khucchaa, abatti gaasoo kol Yeesso Yuuda ergate, wihi icho daaw ka ꞌdoonaan, “Soogat,” iyidahye, ommos us, “Wohoo miskiin sii,” iyidahye koogyahiin.
Chirraas on Yuuda makaate khaate, dowwa bahe. Il la a ibeen.
Inkoo Yuuda bahe ka, Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Toolla Ínam Aadam a laweynaache. Ulla saggi Waakh iweenyahe ꞌdooꞌd a tusa.
Anna chirri an saggi Waakh iweenyahe ꞌdooꞌd tuse, Waakh laka saggi Ínam Aadam iweenyahe ꞌdooꞌde tusa, toro la dowwa tusa.
“Nyaakhutaaw, an kola geeddoo rucchul on atin leefiddiya. Atin a iyowattaane, iꞌdaasenyi iꞌdi goorat an yaafohi Yaꞌhuud iidah u, inti an irdi emeet ma tabuuꞌdiin.
“Amuroo husube atin siicha. Taba isꞌdoona. Saggi an atin iꞌdoone, atin laka saggaas isiꞌdoona.
Chaꞌatin isꞌdoontaan, ꞌdooꞌd tuumman saggi atin abattiteey itahiin a abta.”
Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Kamur, at intoh iratta?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Toolla inti an irdi ma ileeiratti. Iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdee yomboka a ileeiratta.”
Beetero la wihi us worsate, “Kamur, an a iꞌdoh toolla kiraahin? An a geeddi an jiroteey laka soobahcho jeentetaah u.”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “At rumanka jeenteteey u jirotaah a soobihissa? Rume kisoocheeka, geeddi lukki iriirin, at kol seyyahe ma igaratti tadeeh.”
Yeesso toro wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Amalalina, Waakh kakhuufa, ani laka ikakhuufa.
Min Aabbaheey goonanneti ittaawenye khaba. Anna a irda, meel atin iyeela. Chirri kootte waha iꞌdaas ieheynan, ma atin isoocheeko.
Chirri an irde meel atin iyeele la, a soonokhda, meesseey atin geecha, ꞌdee inti an kajiro, atin laka kajirtaan.
Jiti inti an isohdi irti a garattaan.”
Toomas la wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, inti at isohatti nah ma garanni, saggoh jiti intaas isohti iabanna?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “An a jit, an a rum, an a jiro. Eti ani ileeyimiy on menye, et Aabbaheey iyamiit mele.
Chaꞌatin rumanka igaratteen, Aabbaheey laka a garattaan. Uus toolla kakhabatti atin usu a abatteene, toro la a agarteen.”
Fiilif la wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, bal Aabbahaah nah tus, nah walah addane nah ꞌdoonno mele.”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Fiilif, geeddi deere atin tuumman atin leejire, toro ichoow uliba at ma iaban ba? Eti tuummane ani iarge, Aabbaheey a arge. A iꞌdohe toro, ‘Aabbahaah nah tus,’ ielatta?
Fiilif, at saggi an Aabbaheey goytiis ifiddiyo, ulla goyteey ifiddiyo ma rummeysatti? Yeeda an eldi ani ma ikiimaatane, Aabbaheeyki goyteey fiddiyo iche waha tuumman yeela.
Chirra ani, ‘An Aabbaheey goytiissa fiddiya, ulla goytaaya fiddiya,’ atin iidah, irummeesda giꞌde. Chirri atin irummeysan, wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaaꞌdane an yeelo ka rummeesda giꞌde.
Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane ani irummeesti, wihi an yeelo a yeela. Wihi waha kussan laka a yeela, iꞌdi tahe an Aabbahaaya inokhda.
Anna walahbaaw atin jeenteti atin keey itahiin u daahteen a atin iyeela, ꞌdee Weeli Waakh Aabbahiis weynaacha.
Walahbaaw tahe ka, jeenteti atin keey itahiin idaaha anna a atin iyeelaa.
“Chirri atin iꞌdoontaan, amuri an atin siiche a raahtaan.
Anna Aabbaheey a daaha, ulla ꞌDooggargaartotoo

Waha a Rubeyti Munyeenye rum leh. ꞌDooꞌdi harrata la Rubeyti Munyee ma khaatti. Iꞌdi tahe icho Rubeyta Munyee ma argaane, ommos ma gartaan. Iꞌdaasenyi atin a garattaan, a mehe Rubeyti Munyee toolla a atin leefiddiita, toro berri goytiinna kijirta.
Saggi nyaakhuti ꞌdooꞌdi dele katuume ma atin ikatabo, a atin isoonokhda.
Geeddoo rucchul ka kola ꞌdooꞌdi harrata toro ma iargo, iꞌdaasenyi atin a iagartaan. Toro jeenteti an ijiruu, atin laka ꞌdee jiro a ꞌhessaan.
Maantaas saggi ani ichoow Aabbaheey wohoo kalday inahe, atin ichoow ani wohoo kalday inahe, toro la ani ichoow atin wohoo kalday inahe a kassaan.
Eti iꞌdoono, a ki amurreteey khabti, toro raaho. Eti iꞌdoono la, Aabbaheey laka usú a ꞌdoona, ani laka usu a ꞌdoona, toro la eti an ahe la a tusa.”
Yuuda ꞌdeerka, kan Yuudahi inam Iskaariyoote menye, wihi us yidah, “Kamur, at a iꞌdoh dowwanoha ka nah isitussa, ꞌdooꞌdi harrata la isitusiwwaayta?”
Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Eti tuummane iꞌdoono, wihi an abcho a raaha. Aabbaheey usu a ꞌdoona. Aabbaheey ichoow ani usu a inamiite fureenyo goytiis kayeelanna.
Eti tuummane ani iꞌdoonin, wihi an abche laka ma raaho. Wihi atin daagteen la weheey menye, Aabbaheeyki isooerge iche kayimaateen.
“Waha tuumman geeddi an atin leefiddiyo iche atin isoocheeke.
Iꞌdaasenyi Rubeyti Munyeenye ꞌDooggargaarto layadeehe, Aabbaheey meesseey ka sooergo, walah tuummane atin abissa, toro la wihi tuummane an atin isoocheeke, atin kasooꞌhelissa.
Nebeye atin ikataba. Nebeytaaya atin siicha. Saggi ꞌdooꞌdi harrata nebey ꞌdooꞌd isiicho mee an nebey atin isiicho. Amalalina toro la roorro akhabina.
“Anihi, ‘A irda toro a atin isoonokhda,’ eldi a daagteen. Chirri atin iꞌdoonteen, jeenteti an Aabbaheey ikiirduu, a hamaaddaan. A mehe Aabbaheey ani a ikaweenyahe.
Waha tuumman la geeddi icho iitaahane atin icheeke, ꞌdee ꞌdeerka maanti icho yateehiin rummeysattaan.
Geeddi deer ma atin leeyyeedo, a mehe karnati harrata a soosohtaa. Us miig ma ikakhabo,
iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdooꞌdi harrata saggi an Aabbaheey iꞌdoono an amur Aabbaheey iraaho a abta.
“Kaaleya inta a katabno.”
Yeesso toro wihi us yidah, “An a iꞌdi geeyi sabiibe rummaate, Aabbaheey la a eti gos hil kahaaggicho.
Aabbaheey la eti tuummane iꞌdi liikhimeet u ani ikatoollo gurnaan idelin, a goocha. Eti tuummane iꞌdi liikhimeet u gurnaan delo la, Aabbaheey mujjume yeela,
Atin la ꞌhor on wihi an atin abche ka, atin mujjummooche.

Goyteey fiddiya, anna goytiin a fiddiyo. Liikhime keley gurnaan iche bihisso mele. Chirri iche gurnaan bihisso, a chirri iche geeyi sabiib katolosso on. Atin laka iꞌdaasu, chirri atin goyteey ifiddiyin, walah atin ꞌduuꞌddaan mele.
“An a iꞌdi geeyi sabiibe, atin la a iꞌdi liikhimohaaya. Eti tuummane goyteey fiddiyo, anna goytiis fiddiyo, gurnaanki buurenye dela. Laanteey walah atin ꞌduuꞌddaan mele.
Eti tuummane goyteey ifiddiyin, iꞌdi liikhimeet u a laroga, angaga. Liikhimohi iꞌdaase a lasoosuuna, ꞌdab lakalugꞌda, laguba.
Chirri atin goyteey fiddiitaane, yeedeey la goytiin fiddiyo, wihi atin ꞌdoontaan tuumman Aabbaheey a daahtaane, ulla atin siicha.
Chirri atin gurnaanki buure bihissaan, saggi atin abattiteey itahiine tussaan. Iꞌda ka la, Aabbaheey a laweynaacha.
“Saggi Aabbaheey ani iꞌdoono, iche ani laka atin iꞌdoona. Goyteey fiddiya, ꞌdee ani a atin ꞌdoono giꞌde.
Chaꞌatin amurreteey raahtaan ꞌdoonintaaya kafiddiitaan, saggi an amurre Aabbaheey iraahe an ꞌdoonintiis ikafiddiyuu.
“Waha la a atin isoocheeke, ꞌdee atin laka hamaadi an khabo khabtaane, toro la hamaadiin walah kaankhati mele.
“Amuri an atin siicho kalla, saggi an atin iꞌdoonuu, taba atin laka isꞌdoona.
Wihi ꞌdooninti enenyet aalassiis weyti ꞌdoono tuso kallaayo, a ti us jirotiis jeentetichuu isoobahcho.
Atin a aalassaaya chirri atin amureey raahtaan.
“Kola ilbooyye ma atin adeeh, iꞌdi tahe ilbooyye wihi kamuriche haaggicho ma garatti. Aalassaaya atin adeeh. Iꞌdi tahe wihi tuummane an Aabbaheey kadaage, a atin isoocheeke.

Atin ani ma isoobahsan, iꞌdaasenyi ani atin soobahsade, toro hiloo atin korche, ꞌdee gurnaan bihissaan, gurnaanki fiddiyo bihissaan. ꞌDeerka jeenteti atin keey itahiin u, Aabbaheey wihi tuummane atin daahtaan, a atin siicha.
Amurreteey taacheyye, taba giꞌde isꞌdoona.
“Chirri ꞌdooꞌdi wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho atin ꞌdiiꞌde, saggi icho kolooraat ani iꞌdiiꞌdeen abda.
Chirri kootte atin iꞌdi ꞌdooꞌda harrata tahiin, ꞌdooꞌdaas a atin ꞌdoona, iꞌdi ꞌdooꞌdichuu. Atin ꞌdooꞌdi harrata menye, iꞌdaasenyi an a atin soobahsade. Jeentetaase ꞌdooꞌdi harrata atin iꞌdiiꞌda.
Wihi an atin iidah kasooꞌhela, ‘Falfá kamuriche kaween mele.’ Chirri ꞌdooꞌdi harrata ani sina iomhicho, atin laka sina a atin omhichaan. Chirri icho wihi an abche raaheen la, wihiin laka a raahaan.
Waha tuumman la jeenteti atin keey itahiin u, a atin layeela. Iꞌdi tahe icho eti ani isooergate ma gartaan.
“Chirri goorat an iimaatane an icho ileeyyeedin, uskeel lakacheekti mele gon. Iꞌdaasenyi toolla uskeelicho ka walah icho laabaan mele.
Eti tuummane ani inibhaate, Aabbaheéy laka a nibhaate.

Chirri kootte an goycho ka wihi injire liiyeelin iyeelin, uskeel ma khabaan. Iꞌdaasenyi toolla wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaaꞌdane an yeele a argeene, toro Aabbaheey ichoow ani ba a nah nibhaateen.
Iꞌdaasenyi waha toolla a yateehiine, wihi Amurreticho lakachiire labuuhicha, ‘Walah an yeele icho ikaꞌdiiꞌdaan mele.’
“Maanti Rubeyti Munyeenye ꞌDooggargaarto layadeehe Aabbaheey katamiit an atin isooergo, Rubeyta Munyeenye rum lehe Aabbaheey katamiit, a atin itamiite, wori ani imiinsan atin icheekta.
Atin laka woraaya cheektaan. A mehe uuꞌ goorat maanti an hila sookhabde, a ileejirteen.
“Wahanyeyyoha a atin isoocheeke, uus atin kakhuufnaanki atin ikakhuuftaan ka soodihin.
Minassi weysiite Yaꞌhuud ka a atin lariha. Ibeen la a yamiit, ki eti atin yagiis tuumman, kol us wihi us yeelo ka Waakh gargaaro koogyahe.
ꞌDooꞌd la waha tuumman a atin yeela, iꞌdi tahe icho Aabbaheey ma gartaane, ani laka ma igartaan.
Waha la a atin isoocheeka, ꞌdee chirri maanti icho waha yeelaan yitah ka, wihi an atin iidah kasooꞌhessaan.
“Waha maanti kolooraate atin abattiteey titaaheen ma atin isoocheekin. Iꞌdi tahe an a atin leejiree.
An kola ꞌdee eti goorat isooerge inokhda. Etiinkoo kaldaye inti an isohdi worsati la ma jiro.
Toolla an waha atin isoocheeke la, a bolokhtaan.

Iꞌdaasenyi rume atin icheeka, katabnaanki an atin katabo, a iroonotiinna. Iꞌdi tahe chirri an iiran, Rubeyti Munyeenye, ꞌDooggargaarto layadeeh, ma atin itamiit. Iꞌdaasenyi chirri an irde a atin isooerga.

Maanti ꞌDooggargaartota timiy la, ꞌdooꞌdi wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho saggi malicho baabul iyahe a tussa. Mali icho khabaane fissanoonki Waakh miinsan a baabul. Toro la wihi saggi Waakh ꞌdooꞌdi harrata ꞌdee ihukkumo miinsan a baabul.
Mali icho khabaane uskeel miinsan a baabul, iꞌdi tahe icho ani ma irummeysan.
Mali icho khabaane fissanoonki Waakh miinsan a baabul, iꞌdi tahe an Aabbahaaya iirda, atin la toro ma iagartaan.
Mali icho khabaane saggi Waakh ꞌdooꞌdi harrata ꞌdee ihukkumo miinsan a baabul, iꞌdi tahe Waakh orey on karnati harrata uskeel igooche.
“Wihi buurenye an atin isoocheeko a jiraane, iꞌdaasenyi toolla a atin kahulees.

Iꞌdaasenyi maanti Rubeyti Munyeenye rum leh atin itimiy, runti tuummane Waakh katimiy a atin tussa. Rubeyti Munyee la awtiche ma kayeyyeeddo. Wihi iche daagte, ichoow wihi ꞌdee berri sooyateeh, iche atin isoocheekta.
Rubeyti Munyee saggane ani iweynaassa, wihi an adeehe sookhaatta, atin isoocheekta.
Wihi tuummane Aabbaheey khabo, a wahaaya, jeentetaase, Rubeyti Munyee wihi an adeehe sookhaatta, atin isoocheekta atin ikadowa.”
Yeesso wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Geeddoor rucchul goyaka ma iagartaane, ꞌdee yomboka la toro a iagartaan,”

Abattitiis gaasoo wihi iche isitidah, “Yeesso chirri us, ‘Geeddoor rucchul ka ma iagartaane ꞌdee yomboka la a iagartaan,’ inno idowo, mehe essa? Toro chirri us, ‘Aabbahaaya iirda,’ inno idowo, mehe essa?
Waha us, ‘Geeddoor rucchul,’ essi ma garanni. Iꞌda ka mehe essa? Wihi us essi ma garanni.”
Yeesso saggi iche aytaas worsan iꞌdoonto abte, ꞌdeerka wihi us iyidah, “Atin wihi an, ‘Geeddoor rucchul ka ma igartaane, ꞌdee yomboka la a iagartaan,’ kiidah, iche isworsattaan?
Rume atin icheeka, atin a ooytaane, uuwwissaane, iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdooꞌdi wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho a hamaada. Atin a bolokhtaane, iꞌdaasenyi bolokkhiin a luurgiyicha hamaad lakayeela.
Makhaabassi weel desso a bolokhta a mehe ibeenkiche a yitahyee. Iꞌdaasenyi uus weel dessi, sinatiche dabta, hamaadda, jeenteti weeloo harrata ka idessuu.
Atin ka laka iꞌdaas on tateeh. Toolla a bolokhtaane, iꞌdaasenyi toro a atin arga, atin la weyti hamaaddaane, et hamaadiin atin kakhaato la mele.
Maantaas walah atin iworsattaan mele. Rume atin icheeka, walahbaaw jeenteti atin keey itahiin u daahteen Aabbaheey a atin siicha.
Atin ichoowka uliba walah atin jeenteti atin keey itahiin u daahteen mele. Waakh wihi atin ꞌdoontaan daaha a ꞌhessaane, ꞌdee hamaadiin la ki buuho iche yateeh.
“Wihi tuummane an atin isoocheeke, jiti mammaheete atin ikasoocheeke. Iꞌdaasenyi ibeen a yateeh, ki an mammah ikayeyyeedine, an wihi Aabbaheey miinsan jiti atin kaabattaan ka an atin isoocheeko.
Maantaas jeenteti atin keey itahiin u, Aabbaheey walah a daahtaan. Anna ꞌdeerka meessiin ka Aabbaheey walah a atin isoodaaha mee eldi.
Jeenteti atin ani iꞌdoontaane toro saggi an Waakh ikiimiy irummeysatteen u Aabbaheey a atin ꞌdoona.
An Aabbahaaya kiimiyye, harrata imiy, toro la harrata a kataba, Aabbaheey inokhda.”
Abatti Yeesso ꞌdeerka wihi iche tidah, “Toolla mujjume yeyyeedda, mammaho ma kaayyeeddo, wihi tahe on nah siisatta.
Toolla saggi at walah tuumman igaratti a agarra. At mali weeli enenyet geeddi us walah isooidaahan laka a garatta. Jeentetaas u, saggi at Waakh ikatimiy a rummeysanna.”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Kola a irummeysatteen?
Iꞌdaasenyi maane a tamiite kola la a titah, ti atin tuumman seley baabaataane, ebba goobiis irti. Keleye ikatabtaane, iꞌdaasenyi an keley mee, iꞌdi tahe Aabbaheey a ileejira.
Waha la a atin icheeke, ꞌdee ani ka nebey ꞌhessaan. ꞌDooꞌdi harrata goyaka sina a atin taham. Iꞌdaasenyi roorro akhabina, an harrata a soorichee.”
Inkoo Yeesso waha yidah ka, serey yeye, Waakh wahte, wihi us yidah,
“Aabba, ibeen a yitah. Weelaah weynaay, ꞌdee Weelaah a kiweynaacho.
Iꞌdi tahe at usu antohi us ꞌdooꞌdi harra tuumman kaanti a isiisse. Ulla ꞌdee ꞌdooꞌdi at kiis kayeesse tuumman, jiroti jirtuu imassan siicha.
Enenyet la chuꞌus atihi kaldaye rumanka Waakhe kigarti, toro la Yeesso Kiriistohi at sooergatte garti, wahaas a jiroti jirtuu imassan.
Hili goorat at dahanoheey soogelisse an massiche ka, harrata ka an a kiweynaache.
Maantaka Aabbahaaw, weynaanti an geeddi at harra isoouumin kileekhabe ortaah ka iweynaay.
“ꞌDooꞌdi at harrata ka soobahsatte at isiisse, eti at tahe a abche. ꞌDooꞌda kaahha eheete, at la ani isiisse. Icho la yeedaah a raaheen.
Icho la toolla saggi wihi tuummane at isiisse ati ikaayimaateen a gartaan.
Wori at isiisse iche anna icho siiche, icho la rummeesteen. Icho la saggi an rumanka ati ikaaimiy a gartaane, toro saggi at ani isooeregte laka a rummeestaan.
“Icho a iweesda. ꞌDooꞌdi harra tuumman ma iweesdi, iꞌdaasenyi ꞌdooꞌdi at isiisse iweesda. Iꞌdi tahe icho a wahaahha.
ꞌDooꞌdi tuummane an khabo a kaahha, ꞌdooꞌdi tuummane at khabto la a kaaya. Icho ka la ani a liiweynaache.

An kola harra ma kasoojiro, iꞌdaasenyi icho uliba harra kajiraan. Aabbaheeyki munyee, miigti magahaahki at isiisse ka, magahaas ka bariiso, ꞌdee iꞌdi ani ichoow ati ba wohoo kalday inahuu, icho tuumman wohoo kalday a yitaaheen.
Geeddi goorat an icho leejire, magahaas at isiisse ka, a toorribe bariisde. Ki goorat baabaa liigooche on menye, kichekoo kalday laka ma baabiin, ꞌdee wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka lachiire labuuhicha.
“Anna inti at kajirto amiit. Iꞌdaasenyi waha geeddi an harrata kajiro adeehe, ꞌdee saggi an ihamaado, icho laka hamaad rubeyohicho goya buuhicha.
An woraah a siiche, ꞌdooꞌdi wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho la icho a ꞌdiiꞌde. Iꞌdi tahe icho ki harrata mee, iꞌdi an laka ki harrata ieheynan u.
Weysiheey ka wihi an kidaaho, atihi icho harrata kabihisso menye, iꞌdaasenyi a atihi Seytaanki uskeel leh kaholisso.
Iꞌdi an laka ꞌdooꞌdi harrata kichokoo ieheynan u, icho laka ki harrata mee.
“Runtaah ka icho munya kayeel. Yeedaah a ki rummaat.
Saggi goorat at ani ꞌdooꞌdi harrata isooergatte, iche an laka icho ꞌdooꞌdi harrata iergade.
Jeentetichuu la, an a ismunyaacha, ꞌdee icho laka, rumanka lamunyaacha.
“Icho kalday ma iweesdi, ꞌdooꞌdi wori icho cheekaan ka ani irummeesti laka a iweesda.

Aabba, a iweesda, ꞌdee icho tuumman wohoo kalday yateehiin, saggi ati ichoow ani wohoo kalday inahe, toro la ani ichoow ati wohoo kalday inahuu. Aabba, a iweesda ꞌdee icho ichoow inno ba wohoo kalday nateehe ꞌdee ꞌdooꞌdi harrata saggi at ani isooeregte rummeesta.
Weynaanti at isiisse iche icho siiche, ꞌdee icho tuumman wohoo kalday yateehiin, iꞌdi toolla ati ichoow ani ba wohoo kalday inahuu.

Ani ichoow icho ba a wohoo kaldaye, ati ichoow ani ba la a wohoo kalday. Icho ba tuum wohoo kalday yateehiine, ꞌdee ꞌdooꞌdi harrata saggi at ani isooeregte abta, toro la enenyet waha abta, geeddi at iꞌdoonto, geeddaase icho laka ꞌdoonta.

“Aabbahaaw, at icho ani a isiisse. An la ichohi inti an kajiro icho laka kajiraane, ꞌdeeka weynaanti ati isiisse argaan iche ꞌdoona. Weynaantaas la a ti at isiisse jeenteti at ani geeddi harra liisoouumin laka iꞌdoontuu.
“Aabbaheeyki fissan, chirri ꞌdooꞌdi harrata kigaran laka, an a kigarda, ꞌdooꞌda la saggi at ani isooeregte a garta.
Eti at tahe icho a ibabbakkaahiche, toro la oreye isohda weyti eti at tahe ibabbakkaahicha, ꞌdee ꞌdooninti at ani ikhabto goycho a kijirto, ani la goycho a kijiro.”
Inkoo Yeesso weysi massiche ka, abattitiis khabaayi irte, Ankhari Keediroon maaheen. Intaas la gosoo a kajire. Usu ichoow abattitiis ba gosaas goya geleen.
Eti Yeessó ꞌdub goocho Yuuda layadeeh la meel a garta. Iꞌdi tahe Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba, geeddi buurenye intaas iskaꞌheleen.

Yuuda ꞌdeerka iskartoo Rooma ichoow rabittoo minki Waakhe buure yuubisso soowoyaayi yimiyye, gos goya soogele. Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo ꞌdooꞌdaas sooergaté. ꞌDooꞌd la bir ichoow oorassoo khoro bolkho ichoow taa laka a khabe.
Yeesso wihi tuummane usu rubeytiis iyateeh a garta gone, orcho yimiyye wihi us worsate, “Ayyo yowattaan?”
Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Naasarete yowanna.”
Ulla wihi us ilaabe, “A ani gon.” Yuudahi Yeessó ꞌdub goocho la icho a leetoolla.
Chirri Yeesso, “A ani gon!” yidah ka, iche tuummamba yombo inokhatte, kufte.
Yeesso toro inokhte, worsate, “Ayyo yowattaan?”
Iche la wihi iche ilaabte “Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Naasarete yowanna.”
Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “A atin isoocheeke, a ani rubeytaaya. Chirri atin ani iyowattaan, reera addan ꞌdiicha a irti.”
Waha la a yadeehe, ꞌdee wihi us ꞌhor yidah buuhicha. Wihi us ꞌhor yidah la a mehe ya, “Aabbahaaw ꞌdooꞌdi at dahanteey soogelisse koo kalday laka ma ikabaabiin.”
Siimonhi Beetero layadeehe birlab khabe la, birlabiis sooꞌhiire, falfati kuhaanihi weyti ween guꞌdde, nabahti miigeet ngꞌure. Falfata la Maalkus iche layadeeh.
Yeesso la wihi us Beetero iyidah, “Birlabaah min ilaab! Kol sinati Aabbaheey isoogooche ani ikawaarine koogtahe?”
ꞌDeerka koobbinti iskarti Rooma eti iskartaas itoollo khabtaayi ichoow weynaanti Yaꞌhuud Yeesso khabteen. Hidhideene,
koloo etoo magahiis Aanas layadeeh ikeeneen. Aanas la a seyyoh Kayaafahi guꞌhaas ka kuhaanihi weyti ween eheet.
Kayaafa la usú goorat ewweenki Yaꞌhuud waaniche, “A haaggantahe chirri etoo kalday meessi ꞌdooꞌd tuumman kayamuut,” idowe.

Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow etoo addane ullaka abatti Yeessee, Yeesso raaheen. Kuhaanihi weyti ween la eta addane abatti Yeessee a garta. Etaas abattee Yeesso raahe ichoowka uranti kuhaanihi weyti ween leegele.
Iꞌdaasenyi Beetero arit khariche tolossate. Eta addane abatti Yeesseenye kuhaanihi weyti ween garti yombo inokhte, inantoo ilbooyenye arit yuubisso leeyeede, Beetero uram goya soogesse.
Inanti arit yuubisso la wihi iche Beetero worsatte, “Ati abattiti etaas kichekoo mee menya?”
Wihi us ilaabe, “Ani abattitiis mee.”
Il a roffo gone, ilbooyye ichoow iskare ba ꞌhor on ꞌdab bolkhicheene, kasookhaarteene dahambooteen. Beetero laka irte iskar leetoolossate, ꞌdabe dahambootaa.
Chirraakka kuhaanihi weyti ween Yeesso wori abattitiis miinsan ichoow wihi us ꞌdooꞌd abcho wowworsate.

Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “An ꞌdooꞌd tuumman ꞌdowe kaleeyyeede. Kol tuumman minassi weysiite Yaꞌhuud ichoow minki Waakhe buurenye ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud iskaꞌhelo ka laka ꞌdooꞌd wori Waakh a abche. Walah an dagsi ka idah mele.
Toollaka, a iꞌdohe iwowworsatta? ꞌDooꞌdi idaage ma worsatti? Icho la rumanka wihi an idah a gartaanee.”
Uus Yeesso waha yidah ka, etoo ullaka iskarti intaas tolossee, Yeesso fodoor guꞌdde, wihi us iyidah “Ya! Wahaas a saggoh at kuhaanihi weyti ween yeed ikalaabto?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an wohoo suuje idah, ꞌdooꞌd tuumman icheek. Iꞌdaasenyi chirri wihi an idah rum yahiin a iꞌdoh iguꞌdubte?”
Yeesso dahano hidanyahaani, Aanas wihi us yidah, “Khaata, Kayaafahi kuhaanihi weyti weene igeecha.”
Chirra Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh intaas toollo ꞌdab dahammooti ka, ꞌdooꞌdoo wihi us worsate, “At laka abattiti etaas kichekoo mee menya?”
Ulla ꞌdiiꞌde, wihi us yidah, “Mele, ani abattitiis mee.”
Etoo kuhaanihi weyti ween falfatiisenye eti kootte Beetero nabah ngꞌure kichee, wihi us iyidah, “An atihi usú gos goyaka leejirto ma kiargin a?”
Beetero toro yeedaas ꞌdiiꞌde, chirraas on lukki riire.

Baryo ka ewweenki Yaꞌhuud Yeesso min Kayaafa kakhaate, minki buurenye gaafanahi Roomee geeche. Ewweenki Yaꞌhuud la minki etaas goya ma gelin, iꞌdi tahe ichohi geeddi icho gololi daawti Baasakka iumhan isbiꞌdirroocho ma ꞌdoonaan.
Bilaato ꞌdeerka khar ka isoobahe, “Eta mehe kacheekattaan?” worsate.
Icho la wihi icho soolaabeen, “Chirri kootte us wohoo suuje iyeelin nah usu inta ma keenno.”
Bilaato la wihi us iyidah, “Atin rubeytiin khaata, amurretiin ka hukkuma.”
Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud la ꞌdiiꞌdde wihi iche tidah, “Nah antohi nah etoo kalday laka omoot ikagoonno ma khabno.”
Waha a yitaaheene, ꞌdee wihi goorat Yeesso yidahye saggi us isooyamuut miinsan labuuhicha.
Bilaato ꞌdeerka minki buurenye gaafana goya inokhte, Yeesso wahe wihi us worsate, “Karnati Yaꞌhuud a ati?”
Yeesso la wihi us worsate, “Yeeda ati kaayimiy, bal ꞌdooꞌdoo addane eti an ahe kisoocheeke?”
Bilaato wihi us ilaabe, “Kol an Yaꞌhuud ahe koogtahe? Yaaftaah ichoow kuhaaniyyohaahki wewweene dahanteey kisoogesse. At mehe yeesse?”

Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Dakheey ki harrata mee. Chirri kootte iche iꞌdaase tahe, abattiteey diho gessa jiti ewweenki Yaꞌhuud ikakhaban yowatta. Iꞌdaasenyi toolla antohi an walah kadakhdi intoo addane kayamiitiin.”
Bilaato wihi us iyidah, “At ꞌdeerka a karnat!”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Aa, at a eysiisse, chaꞌat an a karnat tidah! Rumanka ani jeentetaase liidele, toro jeentetaase harrata iimiyye, ꞌdee rum cheeka. Eti tuummane rum ꞌdoono, a idagansata.”
Bilaato la wihi us worsate, “Yeedi rummaat a mehe?”
Bilaato toro ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud ibahe wihi us iyidah, “An eta walah lakacheekti an argo mele.
Iꞌdaasenyi a hugunkiinna chaꞌan daawti Baasakka ka etoo hidan atin isoofuro. Anihi ‘Karnati Yaꞌhuud’ soofuro a ꞌdoontaan?”
Icho la riireene, “Mele, usu mee! Barraba nah sii!” yidaaheen. Barraba la goorat ꞌdooꞌdoo sirgaal ꞌdiiꞌdo goya kijire.
Bilaato ꞌdeerka, “Yeesso a lakhaato, laajja ka a lajaho,” yidah.
Iskare la ꞌduuboo kudaheet iskayuubte matah Yeesso korisse, dafartoo muggee laka iꞌdi karnat u gelisse.
Iskare isoononnokhatte, “Karnati Yaꞌhuudoow, jiroti deer ꞌhel,” idoddowte, toro la fodoorre jajjahte.
Bilaato toro koloo addan urur isoobahe, wihi us iyidah, “Yeya, kharane isoobahcha atin ikeena, ꞌdee saggi wohoo rucchule lakahukkumo an ikaargin agartaan.”
Chirri Yeesso ꞌduubi kudaheet ichoow dafarti muggee khabaayi khar isoobahe ka, Bilaato wihi us ꞌdooꞌd iyidah, “Et kalla!”
Uus kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow iskarti minki Waakhe buure yaakhisso Yeesso agarte ka, riirte, “Massalaaba kakaah! Massalaaba kakaah!” tidah.
Iꞌdaasenyi Bilaato wihi us ilaabe, “Atin khaata massalaaba kakaaha. Ani ka walah lakacheekti an argo mele.”
Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud tirriinsatte wihi iche tidah, “Nah amuri eti iꞌdee a layigaase yadeeh a khabna. A mehe us, ‘Aní Weeli Waakhe,’ iche essa.”
Chirri Bilaato saggi Yeesso Weeli Waakh isikawahe daage ka, geeddi kootteet ꞌdirihiis roorro gesse.
Minki buurenye gaafana goya inokhte, Yeesso, “Intoh katimiy?” worsate. Iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso walah us laabe mele.
Bilaato la wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “At ani ma ileeyyeeddo? Saggi an antohi an kaafuro ikhabo ommos antohi an massalaaba kaakaaho ikhabo ma kasso?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Waakh on anto kisiiche menye, at anto at ikakhabto mele. Maantaka eti dahanohaah igesse, uskeeli us khabo kaah laka a kuta.”

Chirri Bilaato waha daage ka, jiti us Yeesso kafuro yowte. Iꞌdaasenyi weynaanti Yaꞌhuud riirte wihi iche tidah, “Chirri at eta soofurte, at aali karnati ili Rooma mee! Eti tuummane karnat iskawaho karnati ili Rooma tirrima.”
Chirri Bilaato yeeda daage ka, Yeesso khaate, khar ibahche, inti ꞌdooꞌd lakahukkumo, “Orotti dagaheet,” layadeeh keene. Magaha afi Ibiraaniya ka la Gabaaꞌda layadeeh.
Sahaꞌd tomon ichoow lammati chirdeereet, Ibeenki Latannabti daawti Baasakka orchee, Bilaato wihi us ꞌdooꞌdi Yaꞌhuud iyidah, “Karnatiin kalla!”
Iꞌdaasenyi riireene, “Agiis, agiis! Massalaaba kakaah,” yidaaheen.
Bilaato toro wihi us worsate, “Anihi karnatiin massalaaba kakaaho ꞌdoontaan?”
Kuhaaniyyohi wewween wihi icho ilaabeen, “Kaaysar on menye, karnat addane nah khabno mele.”
ꞌDaꞌddaboka Bilaato Yeesso dahanohicho gesse, ꞌdee massalaaba a kakaaheen.
Iskare ꞌdeerka Yeesso khaatte.
Yeesso massalaabatiis siꞌdaayi bahe. Meessoo Meessi Lafohi Matahe Enenyet layadeeh irte. Meessa la afi Ibiraaniya ka a Golgooꞌda.
Inta ka massalaaba kakaaheen. Reeroo lammee laka Yeesso leekaaheen. Kooba Yeesso ankiiskoo lakakaahe, Yeesso la dahcho lakakaahe.
Bilaato la amuri baawatoo lachiiro, massalaaba Yeesso sarche lakalooꞌdicho bahche. Wihi lakachiire la a mehe ya,

ꞌDooꞌdi ittaawenye Yaꞌhuud la chiirnaannetaas soome, iꞌdi tahe meessi Yeesso massalaaba lakakaahe, ilkerengeet ma kadeer. Wihi baawa kachiiran la afi Ibiraaniya ichoow afi ꞌDeylaan ichoow afi Giriige lakachiire.
Kuhaaniyyohi wewween la wihi icho Bilaato iyidaaheen, “ ‘Karnati Yaꞌhuud’ akachiirine, iꞌdaasenyi eta, ‘An a karnati Yaꞌhuud,’ iche isyadeeh, kachiir.”
Bilaato wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi an chiire, koloo kalday laka ma luurgiyicho.”
Inkoo iskare Yeesso massalaaba kakaahte ka, gaaddiisti saraat et affar ka gisante. Dafartiisti goyaatteet la a dafartoo kaldache ma tolan la.
Iskare wihi iche isitidah, “Uus inno khakkharadinne, kaaleya kura a iguꞌdubno, eti khaatti a agarro!”
Waha la a yitaaheene, ꞌdee Chiirnaanneti Waakhe iꞌda tadeeh labuuhicha,
“Darfoheey a gismeene,
toro la dafarteeyti goyaatteet kura iguꞌddeen.”
Wihi iskare yeesse ꞌdeerka a wahaas.
ꞌDooꞌdi massalaaba Yeesso hagga toolle a abartiis ichoow iingotiis ichoow Maariyati makhaabál Kiiliyoobaase ichoow Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala.
Yeesso abartiis ichoow eti us abattitiis goyaka weyti ꞌdoono ichohi intaas toollo arge. Yeesso wihi us abartiis iyidah, “Abartaay, eta inankaah kayeelo.”
Etaas abattitiise la wihi us iyidah, “Eta, makhaabassa abartaah kayeelo.” Uus maalinkaas la, eta abattee Maariya khaate goobiis geeche.
Yeesso chirraakka saggi wihi goorat yateeh tuumman iyitaaheen garte. Ulla saggi us wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh tadeeh ibuuhichuu, wihi us yidah, “An a subgaade.”
ꞌDirihoo farsoti sabiibe birrakhe kijirto la intaas a kajire. ꞌDeerka haaruggoo farso goya kalugꞌdeene, haaruggaas khoꞌdoonkoo deer kachuukheene, Yeesso ioogeene, af gesseen.
Chirri us farsota surrukhe ka Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Walah tuumman a massateen.” Wahaas ka matah soolugꞌde, rubey gooche.

Ibeenki Latannabti kola a yitah. Ibeenki kaas sooraaho la, a Seeri Lanaso weyti khumman. Weynaanti Yaꞌhuud la sarti Seeri Lanaso massalaaba kajirto ma ꞌdoonto. Bilaato amuri luhlo lakaajjebcho ꞌdee sar lasooyagcho daaheen.
Iskare ꞌdeerka timiyye, ꞌdooꞌdi kootte Yeesso laleekaahe ki oraat ichoow ki addan ba luhlo jejjebisse.
Iꞌdaasenyi chirri iche Yeesso sooeleesse ka, saggi us iyumuy agarte, luhlohiis ma jejjebin.
Etoo iskareet toor ka Yeesso waaru ꞌhune, diig ichoow bicche kasookhubteen.
Eti waha arge, ayti rummaate cheeke, ꞌdee atin laka Yeesso rummeysattaan. Wihi us cheeke la beene ma kijirto, ulla saggi us rumanka wihi rummaat icheeko, a garta.
Waha la a yitaaheene, ꞌdee wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka lachiire labuuhicha, “Laftiistoo kalday laka ma lajebcho.”
Toro la iꞌdi chiirnaankoo addan Chiirnaanneti Waakh goyaka yadeeh u, “ꞌDooꞌd eti icho toor ka ꞌhuneen a ꞌdeyꞌdoocha.”

Yomboka etoo Yuussuf layadeehe ilkerengeetti Arimaꞌdaaya kayimiy, irte Bilaato sar Yeesso daahe. Yuussuf la dagsi ka abatti Yeesso eheet, jeenteti us weynaanti Yaꞌhuud ikarooruu. Amuri Bilaato siiche ka, yimiyye sar Yeesso khaate.

Eti leejire la, a Nikodeemohi goorat orey Yeesso ibeen iyimiyye, leeyyeede. Nikodeemo uyuuggetoo geeddi kiilo tomon seyyahe sookhaate. Uyuuggetaas la, miricchihoo ichoow abahti geeyoo miir layadeehe islakachibe.
Lammache ba sar Yeesso khaatte, uyuugge kachibeene goonanneti darfoot leeyuubte. Waha ichoow hugunki yaafohi Yaꞌhuud ka saggi eti yumuy il liikalaabo a israahaan.
Inti Yeesso lakakaahe, gosoo a kajire, gosaas goya la goꞌddoo lakhute, enenyet injire liikahawwaalin a kajira.
Waha yaafohi Yaꞌhuud ka a Ibeenki Latannabti gone, goꞌd la a soodowyahe gone, Yeesso goꞌddaas kahawwaaleen.
Baryoti boorane ibeenki oraate teebataas ka, Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala goꞌddi Yeesso lakahawwaale ijedde, saggi daddaab meel afiche liikabahche agarte.
ꞌDeerka Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow eti ullaka abatteenye Yeesso weyti ꞌdoono isoonyaante wihi iche itidah, “Kamur goꞌd goya a lakabahche, inti lagesse la ma garanni.”
ꞌDeerka Beetero ichoow eti abatteenye addan ba anki goꞌd tabeen.
Abatti lammache ba a oriita, iꞌdaasenyi eti addan Beetero kelee luh kaꞌhele, goꞌd orey eleele.
Goꞌd kagulguubsate, goya yeye, darfo kalday arge, iꞌdaasenyi goꞌd goya ma gelin.
ꞌDubiis ka Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh yimiy. Ulla a yiriꞌd one goꞌd goya gele, darfohi meel yaal arge.
Dafarti Yeesso matah kayuyyuubneet laka ichehi layuyyuube intoo keley taal arge.
ꞌDaꞌddaboka eti abatteenye kootte goꞌd orey eleele laka goya gele, arge rummeeste.
Icho uliba Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka saggi Yeesso omoot ikasookaho ma garan.
Abatti lammache ba ꞌdeerka goobassicho inokhatte.
Iꞌdaasenyi Maariya goꞌd khariche tolossatte ooyte. Ooytaayi gulguubsatte, goꞌd goya yeyte.
Herti Waakhe lammeenye gaaddi daddakhan khabto inti sar Yeesso tiil fiddiito, agarte. Hertaas Waakh la too, inti matah kijire iche fiddiita, too la inti luhlo kajireene fiddiita.
Herti Waakh wihi iche Maariya worsatte, “Weela a iꞌdoh iooyta?”
Maariya la wihi iche tidah, “Sar Kamuraaya lakhaate, inti lagesse la ma gardi!”
Waha ka urgiite, Yeessohi intaas toollo agarte. Iꞌdaasenyi saggi us Yeesso iyahe ma kasin.
Yeesso la wihi usu iyidah, “Weela a iꞌdoh iooyta? Ayyo yowatta?”
Iche la kol eta ki gos hil kahaaggicho yahe koogtahe, wihi iche tidah, “Eti ween, chirri at sartiis khaatte, inti at gelisse isoocheeke, a irdi a sookhaato.”
Yeesso wihi usu iyidah, “Maariya.”
Iche la urgiite, riirte afi Ibiraaniya ka “Rabbooni,” tidah. Ayta chiꞌ lalaabe a eti ween.

Yeesso chirraakka wihi us iyidah, “Iikhaban, iꞌdi tahe an uliba Aabbaheey ma inokhan. Nyaame, ꞌdooꞌdi irummeeste iiro, saggi an eti Aabbaheeyenye toro icho laka Aabbahichee ikanokhdi, icheek. Ulla a Waakkhaaya, toro la a Waakkhichooda.”
Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala wora abatti ileeiratte, “An Kamur a arge!” Toro saggi us wahaas ikiidah abatti icheekte.
Gelebti ibeenki oraate teebataas ka, abatti kulante. Minkoo goya iskahidde, iꞌdi tahe weynaanti Yaꞌhuude karoortaa. Iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso goycho tolossate, “Nebeytiin ma furatti,” iyidah.
Inkoo us waha yidah ka, dahanohiis ichoow waaru ba tuse. Abatti uus iche Kamur agarte ka, weyti hamaadde.
Yeesso toro wihi us iyidah, “Nebeytiin ma furatti! Saggi Aabbaheey ani isooerge, iche an laka atin ierga.”
Wahaas ka neebsi kaafuufe, wihi us yidah, “Rubeyti Munyee ꞌhela.
Chirri atin ꞌdooꞌd uskeel ikakutteen, Waakh rumanka ꞌdooꞌdaas uskeel a ikakuta. Chirri atin ꞌdooꞌd uskeel ikakutin la, Waakh laka ꞌdooꞌdaas uskeel ma ikakuto.”
Toomashi abattiti tomon ichoow lammee kichokoowenye, duddunkiis Manꞌdaan layadeeh chirri Yeesso abatti isoobahe intaas ma kajirin.
Abattiti addan ꞌdeerka wihi iche Toomas itidah, “Nah Kamur a agarre.”

Iꞌdaasenyi Toomas wihi us icho iyidah, “Sammata an gumaarreti dahanohiis kajirto an iargine, an farreey inti goorat ussumaar lakaꞌhune an igelinne, dahanteey la inti waaru ka ꞌhunan an igelin, ma rummeesdi.”
Inkoo teebatoo toro kutte ka, abatti toro minkoo goyaka kulante. Toomas laka a leejire. Afaf a hidanyahiine, iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso goycho sootolossate, wihi us iyidah, “Nebeytiin ma furatti.”
ꞌDeerka wihi us Toomas iyidah, “Farraah gumaara geliche, dahanoheey la agar, dahantaah la keene, waaruheey geli. Iikamalaline saggi an omoot ikasookahe rummeyso.”
Toomas chirraakka, “Ati a Kamuraaya, toro la a Waakkhaaya,” iyidah.
Yeesso chirraakka wihi us iyidah, “At jeenteti at ani iagarte iche irummeysatte? Waakh ꞌdooꞌdi ani iargine irummeeste, a imaala.”
Geedda Yeesso abattitiis leejiro, wihi ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso buugga goya liikachiirin iche yeele.
Iꞌdaasenyi waha a lachiire, ꞌdee saggi Yeesso rumanka Ki Lasubhe iyahe, us Weeli Waakh iyahe, rummeysattaan. Kakhuufnaanki atin usu kakhuuftaan ka la jiroti jirtuu imassanne khabtaan.
Inkoo ibeennetoo kutte ka, Yeesso toro abattitiis Beyti Buurenye Tibeeriya

Abatti Yeessoti isleejirte a Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow Toomashi magahiiski addan Manꞌdáan layadeeh ichoow Naꞌdaanayelhi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ka ilkerengeetti Kaana kayimiy ichoow yeele Sebedaayo ichoow abattitoo addane lammee.

Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us abattiti addan iyidah, “An a irda, bahag sookhabda.” Abattiti addan la, “Nah laka a kiraahna,” itidah. ꞌDeerka bahte kooban korte, iꞌdaasenyi ibeenkaas bahag iche khabatte mele.
Chirra orrahe sookorto ka, Yeesso bey afiche sootolossate, iꞌdaasenyi abatti saggi us Yeesso iyahe ma garan.
Yeesso chirraakka wihi us abatti iyidah, “Era, walah bahagenye atin khabatteen mele?”
Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Walah nah khabanne mele.”

Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Oroohti atin bahag kakhabattaan, kooban ankichoki miigeet ka bicche goya iseya, bahag a ꞌhessaanee.” Uus iche iꞌdaas yeesse, bahaggi buure khabatte, ichoowka oroohti iche kooban goya isoojiitto laka agaafatte.

Eti abatti goyaka Yeesso weyti ꞌdoono la wihi us Beetero iyidah, “Waha a Kamureenna alah.” Chirri Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh saggi wahaas Kamur iyahe daage ka, dafartiisti oroot dabar kahiite. Iꞌdi tahe kootte a bahchee. ꞌDeerka bicche goya kadihe.
Abattiti addan la oroohti bahag buuho khabtaayi, kooban ka bey afiche timiy. A mehe icho bey afiche ma kadeerneynane, geeddi mitta kudoo on bey afiche ileejireen.
Chirri iche bey afiche eleesse ka, seeꞌddi bolokhto bahag fuulo agarte. Makaate laka intaas a kajirte.
Yeesso wihi us abatti iyidah, “Bahaggi atin sookhabatteen goyaka, gaasoo sookhaata.”

Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh kooban kore, oroohti bahaggi burbuure buuho soojiite. Bahaggi icho ꞌheleen a bahag kudoo ichoow tomon chan ichoow bahag seyyah. Iꞌdaasenyi chiꞌ bahag burbuur eheet laka, oroohe ma goggowin ba.
Yeesso wihi us icho iyidah, “Kaaleya golossada.” Abatti goyaka, et, “At a ayyo?” worsati mele. Saggi us Kamur iyahe a garteen.
Yeesso toro makaate khaate, abatti idiibe, bahag laka toro iꞌdaas on yeele.
Waha la a koli seyyahnaatteete Yeesso inkoo us omoot kasookahe, abattitiis isoobahe.
Inkoo icho golossateen ka, Yeesso wihi us Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh iyidah, “Siimon, ínam Yoohana, at geeddi abattita addan iꞌdoonto, ꞌdirihiche weyti a iꞌdoonta?”
Ulla, “Aa, Kamur, ati rubeytaah saggi an kiꞌdoono a garatta,” iyidah.
Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “ꞌDooꞌdeeyki iꞌdi makhassi iiyyaate goolli giꞌde.”
Yeesso toro koli lammaatteet inokhte, wihi us iyidah, “Siimon, ínam Yoohana, at rumanka a iꞌdoonta?”
Wihi us ilaabe, “Aa, Kamur, at saggi an kiꞌdoono a garatta.”
Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “ꞌDooꞌdeeyki iꞌdi iiyteeye yaakhi giꞌde.”
Koli seyyahnaatteet Yeesso toro inokhte, wihi us iyidah, “Siimon, ínam Yoohana, at rumanka a iꞌdoonta?”
Beetero jeenteti Yeesso kol seyyah, “At a iꞌdoonta?” iworsatuu, fool ribowe, wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, at walah dakkhan a garatta. Saggi an kiꞌdoono la a garatta!”
Yeesso wihi us iyidah “Tab giꞌde, ꞌdooꞌdeeyki iꞌdi iiyteeye goolli.”

Yeesso toro wihi us iyidah, “Rume kisoocheeka, maanti goorat at nugussahe, a sookahta, darfo gessatta, meessi at iran ꞌdoonto tuumman iratta. Iꞌdaasenyi maanti at araarrowte, dahanohaah a oogta, etoo addan la gaad kigessa, inti at iran iꞌdoonin kigeecha.”
Yeeda Yeesso yidah mehe tusa ya, omootti Beetero yamuute, ꞌdee omoottiis ka Waakh laweynaacho. ꞌDeerka Yeesso wihi us Beetero iyidah, “Kaale, abattiteey ateeh.”

Beetero urgiye, etoo ullaka abatteenye ꞌdubicho sooraaho arge. Eta a ki goorat Yeesso weyti ꞌdoono, maanti goorat Yeesso gololi ꞌdaꞌddaboot abatti leeyuhum, Yeesso garabiis fiddiye, Yeesso kasiihsate, “Kamur, eti ꞌdub kigoocho a ayyo?” worsate.
Beetero chirri us arge ka, wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Kamur, eta la mehe layeela?”
Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an usuhi ichoowka maanti an soonokhdi jiro ꞌdoono, wahaas ati walah icho kiyahiin mele. At kaale abattiteey ateeh!”

Jeentetaas u woraas leessi ꞌdooꞌdi Kiriisto rummeeste goya kataaꞌhe. Wihi icho esseen a mehe ya, “Eta abattee ma yamuut.” Iꞌdaasenyi Yeesso ma yamuut ma idaahane, wihi us yidah a mehe ya, “Chirri an usuhi ichoowka maanti an soonokhdi jiro ꞌdoono, wahaas ati walah icho kiyahiin mele.”
Eti abatteenye waha runticho garti, cheeko, toro la chiire, a kan. Saggi wihi us yidah rum iyahiin la a garanna.
Yeesso wohoo addane ittaawe laka a yeele. Chirri kootte wahaas tuumman lachiire, imurchoteey ka, harra tuumman laka, buuggassi wahaas tuumman lakachiire, meel iche gelisso mele.
ꞌDeyoofilohaaya, khadaabeeyki oraat ka,
ichoowka ibeenki goobi Waakh lageeche, iche kisoochiire. Geeddi serey liigeen, Rubeyti Munyee ka ꞌdooꞌdi us soobahsate us ergaanotiis kayeesse, amurre ibahche.
Inkoo sina lakawaariche us reera a isoobahe, jitassi ittaawe ka saggi us rumanka ijiro tuse. Geeddi ibeen tomon affar icho a isoobahe, wori dakhi Waakh miinsan kaleeyyeede.
Maantoo leegolossataayi amurane ibahche, “Ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem akabihina, iꞌdaasenyi siinti goorat Aabbaheey atin iayyiche, an woriche kaayyeedo atin daagteen suga.
A mehe Yoohana enenyet bicche kabaattissiye, iꞌdaasenyi maanassa, Rubeyti Munyee ka a atin labaattissiya.”
Saahka maanti icho kulmeen ka wihi icho usu worsateen, “Kamur, antohi yaafohi Issiraayel harraticho kaantaan maanassa on toro ilaabta?”
Yeesso la icho mehe iyidah ya, “Aabbaheey antohiissa on ka maan ichoow chirri walah dakkhan yateehiin gooche. Atin mee maanti icho yateehiin abattaan.

Iꞌdaasenyi maanti Rubeyti Munyee atin isooyagte, miig a ꞌhessaane, atin la weheeyki atin garattaan cheektaan. Ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka ichoow boroofenneti Yaꞌhuudiya ichoow ti Saamariya ka ichoow harra tuumman ka cheektaan.”
Inkoo us yeedaas yidah ka, iche ꞌdeyꞌdoossaayi, Yeesso serey liikorche, mirisoo la icho kadagche.
Geedda us serey irti, sereye ꞌdeyꞌdoochaan. Chirraas on reeroo lammeenye
“Era atinha boroofenhi Gaalilaaya!” yidah, “A iꞌdoh itolossaane serey iꞌdeyꞌdoossaan? Yeessoha atin lakakhaate serey lageeche, saggaas atin iagartaane us serey iirti on isoonokhta.”
Ergaano ꞌdeerka Hali Geeyohi Oolif kakhubatte, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhatte. Halaas la Yeerusaleem ka a geeddi kiilomittatoo kalday.

Chiꞌicho sooeleeleen ka, inti minki saraate iche maanassaas fiddiito ikorte. Ichehi intaas fiddiito a Beetero ichoow Yoohana ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Andereeya ichoow Fiilif ichoow Toomas ichoow Barꞌdolomaayo ichoow Mattaayo ichoow inam Alfaayoki Yaakoobo layadeeh ichoow Siimonhi Yaaftiisꞌdoone layadeeh ichoow inam Yaakooboki Yuuda layadeeh.
Ichohaas tuumman, ichoow oboorrihoo addan ichoow Maariyati abar Yeessee, ichoow walaalinye Yeesso ba kol tuumman a sooururaane Waakh isleewahtaan.
Inkoo ibeennetoo kutte ka, ꞌdooꞌdi Kiriisto rummeeste soourure. Icho tuumman la a geeddi et kudoo ichoow tomon lamma. Beetero la kahe yeede,
wihi us yidah, “ꞌDooꞌd Kiriistokaaw, wihi massan Chiirnaanneti Waakhe Rubeyti Munyee Dawuud afiis leekeente, Yuudahi ꞌdooꞌdi Yeesso khabti soowoye miinsan a labuuhicha.
Us a keenyokoowe hila Waakh a nah kaleejire.”
Yuuda kalaꞌddi us jiti khollokkhan kaꞌhele ka gosoo soogatte. Gosaas goya on ka soodihe, uur desme, mindakharo tuumman sookhubteen.
Enenyeti ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kijiro tuumman daage, gosaas magah ibahcheene aficho ka Akeldaama yidaaheen. Iꞌdaakka la mehe leessa ya, “Gosi Diig.”
Beetero wihi us yidah, “A mehe buuggi Sabuur ka wihi chiiran,
“ ‘Goobiis ba a baabo,
uus etoo kalday laka jirin.’
Wihi addane chiiran,
“ ‘Etoo addan ba meessiisti weynaaneet gela.’
Maantaka wihi massan, etoo geeddi Kamureenki Yeessee nah leefiddiye tuumman nah leejire soobihinno.

Eti uus maanti Yoohana enenyet baattissiyo sookhabte ichoowka maanti Yeesso nah lakakhaate serey lageeche nah leejire a eheetti. A mehe a nah isookhaya ꞌdee garti saggi Yeesso omoot liikasookahche nah leecheeka.”
ꞌDeerka et lamma magahenye waheen. Yuussufhi Barsabba layadeehe magahiiskoo Yaasto layadeeh ichoow Mattiyas.
ꞌDeerka Waakh wahteen, “Kamur, ati uurassi enenyet tuumman a garatta. Maantaka ꞌdooꞌda lammatiis ki at soobahsatte,
ꞌdee hila Waakhe ergaano gelo nah tus. Waha la a meessi Yuuda kabahe, ulla inti imasse irtee.”
